  • Create MCQ Type Question - Negative Test Specification 00:02:01
  • Create MCQ Type Question - Data Driven Positive Test Specification 00:00:09

Create MCQ Type Question - Negative Test Specification

  • 7Failed
  • 101Passed
  • 0Skipped
00:02:01
Tags: create_question create_question_mcq_type create_question-negative_tests negative

Date Created : 12/08/2017

Version : 1.0.0

Owner : Osanda Deshan

Description : This is an executable specification file which follows markdown syntax. Every heading in this file denotes a scenario. Every bulleted point denotes a stepdefinition.

Create a question using a positive integer value as the lastAswered

00:00:00
Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • Given that a user needs to invoke "Create MCQ Type Question"

    API Endpoint is:
    http://10.199.253.84:8070/api/questions

Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • And the user set the request authentication configurations as follows
    Configuration Property NameConfiguration Property Value
    isAccessTokenIncludedTrue
    isAccessTokenRetrievedFromTextFileTrue
    accessTokenStringN/A
Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • And the user set the request attributes as follows
    Attribute Value In JSON TemplateAttribute Value To Be Set
    #creatorIdosanda12
    #creatorPlatformWeb
    #creatoredSourceApp
    #creatoredTypeManual
    #deckId51
    #kindMULTIPLE_CHOICE
    #learningObjectivesobjective1
    #imageUrlhttps://documentservice-qa.stg-prsn.com/api/v1/documents/5a155f35d5b71d1a8a54dd58/download/public?format=ORIGINAL
    #mediaTEXT
    #questionPromptWho is the owner of MaxSoft?
    #promptTypeTEXT
    #timeout120
    #rationalerationale
    #boxId1
    #correctAttempts1
    #inCorrectAttempts0
    #lastAswered123
    #questionId0
    #skips0
    #userId0
    #correctAnswerList1,2
    #answer1Id1
    #answer1ValueOsanda
    #answer1TypeTEXT
    #answer1CaseSensitivetrue
    #answer2Id2
    #answer2ValueGemunu
    #answer2TypeTEXT
    #answer2CaseSensitivetrue
    #answer3Id3
    #answer3ValueEranga
    #answer3TypeTEXT
    #answer3CaseSensitivefalse
    #answer4Id4
    #answer4ValueHeshan
    #answer4TypeTEXT
    #answer4CaseSensitivefalse
    #answer5Id5
    #answer5ValueThilina
    #answer5TypeTEXT
    #answer5CaseSensitivetrue
    #tagsMaxSoft

    The JSON request body that you are going to use for the API is:
    {
    “creatorId”: “osanda12”,
    “creatorPlatform”: “Web”,
    “creatoredSource”: “App”,
    “creatoredType”: “Manual”,
    “deckId”: 51,
    “kind”: “MULTIPLE_CHOICE”,
    “learningObjectives”: [
    “objective1”
    ],
    “question”: {
    “imageUrl”: “https://documentservice-qa.stg-prsn.com/api/v1/documents/5a155f35d5b71d1a8a54dd58/download/public?format=ORIGINAL",
    “media”: “TEXT”,
    “prompt”: “Who is the owner of MaxSoft?”,
    “promptType”: “TEXT”,
    “timeout”: 120
    },
    “rationale”: “rationale”,
    “stats”: {
    “boxId”: 1,
    “correctAttempts”: 1,
    “inCorrectAttempts”: 0,
    “lastAswered”: “123”,
    “questionId”: 0,
    “skips”: 0,
    “userId”: 0
    },
    “correctAnswers”: [
    1,2
    ],
    “answers”: [
    {
    “id”: 1,
    “value”: “Osanda”,
    “type”: “TEXT”,
    “caseSensitive”: true
    },
    {
    “id”: 2,
    “value”: “Gemunu”,
    “type”: “TEXT”,
    “caseSensitive”: true
    },
    {
    “id”: 3,
    “value”: “Eranga”,
    “type”: “TEXT”,
    “caseSensitive”: false
    },
    {
    “id”: 4,
    “value”: “Heshan”,
    “type”: “TEXT”,
    “caseSensitive”: false
    },
    {
    “id”: 5,
    “value”: “Thilina”,
    “type”: “TEXT”,
    “caseSensitive”: true
    }
    ],
    “tags”: [
    “MaxSoft”
    ]
    }

Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • When the user invokes the API

    Reading the access token from the text file in the directory of “C:\Users\UnimaOs\IdeaProjects\Smart-Flashcards-API-Testing-Framework\resources\access_tokens\access_token_to_be_used_for_testing.txt” is succeeded

    Invoked API Endpoint:
    http://10.199.253.84:8070/api/questions

    Response is:
    {
    “question”: {
    “timeout”: 120,
    “media”: “TEXT”,
    “prompt”: “Who is the owner of MaxSoft?”,
    “imageUrl”: “https://documentservice-qa.stg-prsn.com/api/v1/documents/5a155f35d5b71d1a8a54dd58/download/public?format=ORIGINAL",
    “promptType”: “TEXT”
    },
    “stats”: {
    “questionId”: 0,
    “userId”: 0,
    “boxId”: 1,
    “skips”: 0,
    “lastAswered”: 123,
    “inCorrectAttempts”: 0,
    “correctAttempts”: 1
    },
    “kind”: “MULTIPLE_CHOICE”,
    “learningObjectives”: [
    “objective1”
    ],
    “rationale”: “rationale”,
    “tags”: [
    “MaxSoft”
    ],
    “creatorId”: “osanda12”,
    “deckId”: 51,
    “creatoredType”: “Manual”,
    “creatorPlatform”: “Web”,
    “creatoredSource”: “App”,
    “answers”: [
    {
    “id”: 1,
    “value”: “Osanda”,
    “type”: “TEXT”,
    “caseSensitive”: true
    },
    {
    “id”: 2,
    “value”: “Gemunu”,
    “type”: “TEXT”,
    “caseSensitive”: true
    },
    {
    “id”: 3,
    “value”: “Eranga”,
    “type”: “TEXT”,
    “caseSensitive”: false
    },
    {
    “id”: 4,
    “value”: “Heshan”,
    “type”: “TEXT”,
    “caseSensitive”: false
    },
    {
    “id”: 5,
    “value”: “Thilina”,
    “type”: “TEXT”,
    “caseSensitive”: true
    }
    ],
    “correctAnswers”: [
    1,
    2
    ],
    “id”: “5a2e514ee4b0b39d83c81f06”,
    “createdAt”: “2017-12-11T09:35:10.654Z”,
    “updatedAt”: “2017-12-11T09:35:10.654Z”
    }

Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • Then the status code for the request is "400" 

    java.lang.AssertionError: The expected status code for the request is not match with the actual status code
     expected [400] but found [201]

    org.testng.Assert.fail(Assert.java:94)
    org.testng.Assert.failNotEquals(Assert.java:494)
    org.testng.Assert.assertEquals(Assert.java:123)
    org.testng.Assert.assertEquals(Assert.java:176)
    com.maxsoft.ata.request.BaseClass.verifyResponseStatusCode(com.maxsoft.ata.request.BaseClass.java:760)
    isResponseStatusCodeEqualTo(com.maxsoft.ata.request.CommonStepDefinitions.java:181)
    stepdefinition.AllStepsDefinitions.verifyResponseStatusCode(stepdefinition.AllStepsDefinitions.java:70)
    sun.reflect.GeneratedMethodAccessor131.invoke(Unknown Source)
    sun.reflect.DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.java:43)
    java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Method.java:498)
    com.thoughtworks.gauge.execution.MethodExecutor.execute(MethodExecutor.java:38)
    com.thoughtworks.gauge.execution.StepExecutionStage.executeStepMethod(StepExecutionStage.java:74)
    com.thoughtworks.gauge.execution.StepExecutionStage.executeStep(StepExecutionStage.java:67)
    com.thoughtworks.gauge.execution.StepExecutionStage.execute(StepExecutionStage.java:49)
    com.thoughtworks.gauge.execution.AbstractExecutionStage.executeNext(AbstractExecutionStage.java:24)
    com.thoughtworks.gauge.execution.HookExecutionStage.execute(HookExecutionStage.java:43)
    com.thoughtworks.gauge.execution.ExecutionPipeline.start(ExecutionPipeline.java:29)
    com.thoughtworks.gauge.processor.ExecuteStepProcessor.process(ExecuteStepProcessor.java:39)
    com.thoughtworks.gauge.connection.MessageDispatcher.dispatchMessages(MessageDispatcher.java:91)
    com.thoughtworks.gauge.GaugeRuntime.dispatchMessages(GaugeRuntime.java:105)
    com.thoughtworks.gauge.GaugeRuntime.access$100(GaugeRuntime.java:37)
    com.thoughtworks.gauge.GaugeRuntime$2.run(GaugeRuntime.java:86)
    java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:745)
Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • And the JSON Path Assertions for the response should be equal to the following
    JSON PathValue
    $.stats.lastAswered123

Create a question using null as the answer5Type

00:00:00
Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • Given that a user needs to invoke "Create MCQ Type Question"

    API Endpoint is:
    http://10.199.253.84:8070/api/questions

Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • And the user set the request authentication configurations as follows
    Configuration Property NameConfiguration Property Value
    isAccessTokenIncludedTrue
    isAccessTokenRetrievedFromTextFileTrue
    accessTokenStringN/A
Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • And the user set the request attributes as follows
    Attribute Value In JSON TemplateAttribute Value To Be Set
    #creatorIdosanda12
    #creatorPlatformWeb
    #creatoredSourceApp
    #creatoredTypeManual
    #deckId51
    #kindMULTIPLE_CHOICE
    #learningObjectivesobjective1
    #imageUrlhttps://documentservice-qa.stg-prsn.com/api/v1/documents/5a155f35d5b71d1a8a54dd58/download/public?format=ORIGINAL
    #mediaTEXT
    #questionPromptWho is the owner of MaxSoft?
    #promptTypeTEXT
    #timeout120
    #rationalerationale
    #boxId1
    #correctAttempts1
    #inCorrectAttempts0
    #lastAswered2018-01-01T12:00:00+01:00
    #questionId0
    #skips0
    #userId0
    #correctAnswerList1,2
    #answer1Id1
    #answer1ValueOsanda
    #answer1TypeTEXT
    #answer1CaseSensitivetrue
    #answer2Id2
    #answer2ValueGemunu
    #answer2TypeTEXT
    #answer2CaseSensitivetrue
    #answer3Id3
    #answer3ValueEranga
    #answer3TypeTEXT
    #answer3CaseSensitivefalse
    #answer4Id4
    #answer4ValueHeshan
    #answer4TypeTEXT
    #answer4CaseSensitivefalse
    #answer5Id5
    #answer5ValueThilina
    #answer5Type"null"
    #answer5CaseSensitivetrue
    #tagsMaxSoft

    The JSON request body that you are going to use for the API is:
    {
    “creatorId”: “osanda12”,
    “creatorPlatform”: “Web”,
    “creatoredSource”: “App”,
    “creatoredType”: “Manual”,
    “deckId”: 51,
    “kind”: “MULTIPLE_CHOICE”,
    “learningObjectives”: [
    “objective1”
    ],
    “question”: {
    “imageUrl”: “https://documentservice-qa.stg-prsn.com/api/v1/documents/5a155f35d5b71d1a8a54dd58/download/public?format=ORIGINAL",
    “media”: “TEXT”,
    “prompt”: “Who is the owner of MaxSoft?”,
    “promptType”: “TEXT”,
    “timeout”: 120
    },
    “rationale”: “rationale”,
    “stats”: {
    “boxId”: 1,
    “correctAttempts”: 1,
    “inCorrectAttempts”: 0,

  • And the JSON Path Assertions for the response should be equal to the following
    JSON PathValue
    $.messageerror.validation
    $.descriptionnull
    $.fieldErrors[0].objectName
    $.fieldErrors[0].fieldanswers[4].type
    $.fieldErrors[0].messagemust match "TEXT|HTML|IMAGE|VIDEO|AUDIO

Create a question using null as the answer4Type

00:00:00
Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • Given that a user needs to invoke "Create MCQ Type Question"

    API Endpoint is:
    http://10.199.253.84:8070/api/questions

Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • And the user set the request authentication configurations as follows
    Configuration Property NameConfiguration Property Value
    isAccessTokenIncludedTrue
    isAccessTokenRetrievedFromTextFileTrue
    accessTokenStringN/A
Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • And the user set the request attributes as follows
    Attribute Value In JSON TemplateAttribute Value To Be Set
    #creatorIdosanda12
    #creatorPlatformWeb
    #creatoredSourceApp
    #creatoredTypeManual
    #deckId51
    #kindMULTIPLE_CHOICE
    #learningObjectivesobjective1
    #imageUrlhttps://documentservice-qa.stg-prsn.com/api/v1/documents/5a155f35d5b71d1a8a54dd58/download/public?format=ORIGINAL

    #answer4CaseSensitivefalse
    #answer5Id5
    #answer5ValueThilina
    #answer5TypeTEXT
    #answer5CaseSensitivetrue
    #tagsMaxSoft

    The JSON request body that you are going to use for the API is:
    {
    “creatorId”: “osanda12”,
    “creatorPlatform”: “Web”,
    “creatoredSource”: “App”,
    “creatoredType”: “Manual”,
    “deckId”: 51,
    “kind”: “MULTIPLE_CHOICE”,
    “learningObjectives”: [
    “objective1”
    ],
    “question”: {
    “imageUrl”: “https://documentservice-qa.stg-prsn.com/api/v1/documents/5a155f35d5b71d1a8a54dd58/download/public?format=ORIGINAL",

    “promptType”: “TEXT”,
    “timeout”: 120
    },

    “boxId”: 1,

Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • And the JSON Path Assertions for the response should be equal to the following
    JSON PathValue
    $.messageerror.validation
    $.descriptionnull
    $.fieldErrors[0].objectName
    $.fieldErrors[0].fieldanswers[3].type
    $.fieldErrors[0].messagemust match "TEXT|HTML|IMAGE|VIDEO|AUDIO

Create a question using null as the answer3Type

00:00:01
Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • Given that a user needs to invoke "Create MCQ Type Question"

    API Endpoint is:
    http://10.199.253.84:8070/api/questions

Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • And the user set the request authentication configurations as follows
    Configuration Property NameConfiguration Property Value
    isAccessTokenIncludedTrue
    isAccessTokenRetrievedFromTextFileTrue
    accessTokenStringN/A
Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • And the user set the request attributes as follows
    Attribute Value In JSON TemplateAttribute Value To Be Set
    #creatorIdosanda12
    #creatorPlatformWeb
    #creatoredSourceApp
    #creatoredTypeManual
    #deckId51
    #kindMULTIPLE_CHOICE
    #learningObjectivesobjective1
    #imageUrlhttps://documentservice-qa.stg-prsn.com/api/v1/documents/5a155f35d5b71d1a8a54dd58/download/public?format=ORIGINAL
    #mediaTEXT
    #questionPromptWho is the owner of MaxSoft?
    #promptTypeTEXT
    #timeout120
    #rationalerationale
    #boxId1
    #correctAttempts1
    #inCorrectAttempts0
    #lastAswered2018-01-01T12:00:00+01:00
    #questionId0
    #skips0
    #userId0
    #correctAnswerList1,2
    #answer1Id1
    #answer1ValueOsanda
    #answer1TypeTEXT
    #answer1CaseSensitivetrue
    #answer2Id2
    #answer2ValueGemunu
    #answer2TypeTEXT
    #answer2CaseSensitivetrue
    #answer3Id3
    #answer3ValueEranga
    #answer3Type"null"
    #answer3CaseSensitivefalse
    #answer4Id4
    #answer4ValueHeshan
    #answer4TypeTEXT
    #answer4CaseSensitivefalse
    #answer5Id5
    #answer5ValueThilina
    #answer5TypeTEXT
    #answer5CaseSensitivetrue
    #tagsMaxSoft

    The JSON request body that you are going to use for the API is:
    {
    “creatorId”: “osanda12”,
    “creatorPlatform”: “Web”,
    “creatoredSource”: “App”,
    “creatoredType”: “Manual”,
    “deckId”: 51,
    “kind”: “MULTIPLE_CHOICE”,
    “learningObjectives”: [
    “objective1”
    ],
    “question”: {
    “imageUrl”: “https://documentservice-qa.stg-prsn.com/api/v1/documents/5a155f35d5b71d1a8a54dd58/download/public?format=ORIGINAL",
    “media”: “TEXT”,
    “prompt”: “Who is the owner of MaxSoft?”,
    “promptType”: “TEXT”,
    “timeout”: 120
    },
    “rationale”: “rationale”,
    “stats”: {
    “boxId”: 1,
    “correctAttempts”: 1,
    “inCorrectAttempts”: 0,
    “lastAswered”: “2018-01-01T12:00:00+01:00”,
    “questionId”: 0,
    “skips”: 0,
    “userId”: 0
    },
    “correctAnswers”: [
    1,2
    ],
    “answers”: [
    {
    “id”: 1,
    “value”: “Osanda”,
    “type”: “TEXT”,
    “caseSensitive”: true
    },
    {
    “id”: 2,
    “value”: “Gemunu”,
    “type”: “TEXT”,
    “caseSensitive”: true
    },
    {
    “id”: 3,
    “value”: “Eranga”,
    “type”: null,
    “caseSensitive”: false
    },
    {
    “id”: 4,
    “value”: “Heshan”,
    “type”: “TEXT”,
    “caseSensitive”: false
    },

    “id”: 5,
    “value”: “Thilina”,
    “type”: “TEXT”,
    “caseSensitive”: true
    }
    ],
    “tags”: [

    }

    $.fieldErrors[0].objectName
    $.fieldErrors[0].fieldanswers[0].type
    $.fieldErrors[0].messagemust match "TEXT|HTML|IMAGE|VIDEO|AUDIO

    “value”: “Osanda”,
    “type”: “TEXT”,
    “caseSensitive”: true
    },
    {
    “id”: 2,
    “value”: “Gemunu”,
    “type”: “TEXT”,
    “caseSensitive”: true
    },
    {
    “id”: 3,
    “value”: “Eranga”,
    “type”: “TEXT”,
    “caseSensitive”: false
    },
    {
    “id”: 4,
    “value”: “Heshan”,
    “type”: “TEXT”,
    “caseSensitive”: false
    },
    {
    “id”: 5,
    “value”: “Thilina”,
    “type”: “TEXT”,
    “caseSensitive”: true
    }
    ],
    “tags”: [
    “MaxSoft”
    ]
    }

    Reading the access token from the text file in the directory of “C:\Users\UnimaOs\IdeaProjects\Smart-Flashcards-API-Testing-Framework\resources\access_tokens\access_token_to_be_used_for_testing.txt” is succeeded

    Invoked API Endpoint:
    http://10.199.253.84:8070/api/questions

    “description”: null,
    “fieldErrors”: null

Create a question using an empty learningObjective

00:00:00
Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • Given that a user needs to invoke "Create MCQ Type Question"

    API Endpoint is:
    http://10.199.253.84:8070/api/questions

Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • And the user set the request authentication configurations as follows
    Configuration Property NameConfiguration Property Value
    isAccessTokenIncludedTrue
    isAccessTokenRetrievedFromTextFileTrue
    accessTokenStringN/A
Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • And the user set the request attributes as follows
    Attribute Value In JSON TemplateAttribute Value To Be Set
    #creatorIdosanda12
    #creatorPlatformWeb
    #creatoredSourceApp
    #creatoredTypeManual
    #deckId51
    #kindMULTIPLE_CHOICE
    #learningObjectives
    #imageUrlhttps://documentservice-qa.stg-prsn.com/api/v1/documents/5a155f35d5b71d1a8a54dd58/download/public?format=ORIGINAL
    #mediaTEXT
    #questionPromptWho is the owner of MaxSoft? _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _
    #promptTypeTEXT
    #timeout60
    #rationalerationale
    #boxId0
    #correctAttempts1
    #inCorrectAttempts0
    #lastAswered2018-01-01T12:00:00+01:00
    #questionId0
    #skips0
    #userId0
    #correctAnswerList1,2
    #answer1Id1
    #answer1ValueOsanda
    #answer1TypeTEXT
    #answer1CaseSensitivetrue
    #answer2Id2
    #answer2ValueGemunu
    #answer2TypeTEXT
    #answer2CaseSensitivetrue
    #answer3Id3
    #answer3ValueEranga
    #answer3TypeTEXT
    #answer3CaseSensitivefalse
    #answer4Id4
    #answer4ValueHeshan
    #answer4TypeTEXT
    #answer4CaseSensitivefalse
    #answer5Id5
    #answer5ValueThilina
    #answer5TypeTEXT
    #answer5CaseSensitivetrue
    #tagsMaxSoft

    The JSON request body that you are going to use for the API is:
    {
    “creatorId”: “osanda12”,
    “creatorPlatform”: “Web”,
    “creatoredSource”: “App”,
    “creatoredType”: “Manual”,
    “deckId”: 51,
    “kind”: “MULTIPLE_CHOICE”,
    “learningObjectives”: [
    “”
    ],
    “question”: {
    “imageUrl”: “https://documentservice-qa.stg-prsn.com/api/v1/documents/5a155f35d5b71d1a8a54dd58/download/public?format=ORIGINAL",
    “media”: “TEXT”,
    “prompt”: “Who is the owner of MaxSoft? _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _“,
    “promptType”: “TEXT”,
    “timeout”: 60
    },
    “rationale”: “rationale”,
    “stats”: {
    “boxId”: 0,
    “correctAttempts”: 1,
    “inCorrectAttempts”: 0,
    “lastAswered”: “2018-01-01T12:00:00+01:00”,
    “questionId”: 0,
    “skips”: 0,
    “userId”: 0
    },
    “correctAnswers”: [
    1,2
    ],
    “answers”: [
    {
    “id”: 1,
    “value”: “Osanda”,
    “type”: “TEXT”,
    “caseSensitive”: true
    },
    {
    “id”: 2,
    “value”: “Gemunu”,
    “type”: “TEXT”,
    “caseSensitive”: true
    },
    {
    “id”: 3,
    “value”: “Eranga”,
    “type”: “TEXT”,
    “caseSensitive”: false
    },
    {
    “id”: 4,
    “value”: “Heshan”,
    “type”: “TEXT”,
    “caseSensitive”: false
    },
    {
    “id”: 5,
    “value”: “Thilina”,
    “type”: “TEXT”,
    “caseSensitive”: true
    }
    ],
    “tags”: [
    “MaxSoft”
    ]
    }

Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • When the user invokes the API

    Reading the access token from the text file in the directory of “C:\Users\UnimaOs\IdeaProjects\Smart-Flashcards-API-Testing-Framework\resources\access_tokens\access_token_to_be_used_for_testing.txt” is succeeded

    Invoked API Endpoint:
    http://10.199.253.84:8070/api/questions

    Response is:
    {
    “message”: “error.validation”,
    “description”: null,
    “fieldErrors”: [
    {
    “objectName”: “”,
    “field”: “learningObjectives”,
    “message”: “learningObjectives’ Cannot contain empty values”
    }
    ]
    }

Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • Then the status code for the request is "400"
Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • And the JSON Path Assertions for the response should be equal to the following
    JSON PathValue
    $.messageerror.validation
    $.descriptionnull
    $.fieldErrors[0].objectName
    $.fieldErrors[0].fieldlearningObjectives
    $.fieldErrors[0].messagelearningObjectives' Cannot contain empty values

Create a question using an invalid media

00:00:00
Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • Given that a user needs to invoke "Create MCQ Type Question"

    API Endpoint is:
    http://10.199.253.84:8070/api/questions

Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • And the user set the request authentication configurations as follows
    Configuration Property NameConfiguration Property Value
    isAccessTokenIncludedTrue
    isAccessTokenRetrievedFromTextFileTrue
    accessTokenStringN/A
Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • And the user set the request attributes as follows
    Attribute Value In JSON TemplateAttribute Value To Be Set
    #creatorIdosanda12
    #creatorPlatformWeb
    #creatoredSourceApp
    #creatoredTypeManual
    #deckId51
    #kindMULTIPLE_CHOICE
    #learningObjectivesobjective1
    #imageUrlhttps://documentservice-qa.stg-prsn.com/api/v1/documents/5a155f35d5b71d1a8a54dd58/download/public?format=ORIGINAL
    #mediaTEX
    #questionPromptWho is the owner of MaxSoft? _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _
    #promptTypeTEXT
    #timeout60
    #rationalerationale
    #boxId0
    #correctAttempts1
    #inCorrectAttempts0
    #lastAswered2018-01-01T12:00:00+01:00
    #questionId0
    #skips0
    #userId0
    #correctAnswerList1,2
    #answer1Id1
    #answer1ValueOsanda
    #answer1TypeTEXT
    #answer1CaseSensitivetrue
    #answer2Id2
    #answer2ValueGemunu
    #answer2TypeTEXT
    #answer2CaseSensitivetrue
    #answer3Id3
    #answer3ValueEranga
    #answer3TypeTEXT
    #answer3CaseSensitivefalse
    #answer4Id4
    #answer4ValueHeshan
    #answer4TypeTEXT
    #answer4CaseSensitivefalse
    #answer5Id5
    #answer5ValueThilina
    #answer5TypeTEXT
    #answer5CaseSensitivetrue
    #tagsMaxSoft

    The JSON request body that you are going to use for the API is:
    {
    “creatorId”: “osanda12”,
    “creatorPlatform”: “Web”,
    “creatoredSource”: “App”,
    “creatoredType”: “Manual”,
    “deckId”: 51,
    “kind”: “MULTIPLE_CHOICE”,
    “learningObjectives”: [
    “objective1”
    ],
    “question”: {
    “imageUrl”: “https://documentservice-qa.stg-prsn.com/api/v1/documents/5a155f35d5b71d1a8a54dd58/download/public?format=ORIGINAL",
    “media”: “TEX”,
    “prompt”: “Who is the owner of MaxSoft? _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _“,
    “promptType”: “TEXT”,
    “timeout”: 60
    },
    “rationale”: “rationale”,
    “stats”: {
    “boxId”: 0,
    “correctAttempts”: 1,
    “inCorrectAttempts”: 0,
    “lastAswered”: “2018-01-01T12:00:00+01:00”,
    “questionId”: 0,
    “skips”: 0,
    “userId”: 0
    },
    “correctAnswers”: [
    1,2
    ],
    “answers”: [
    {
    “id”: 1,
    “value”: “Osanda”,
    “type”: “TEXT”,
    “caseSensitive”: true
    },

    “id”: 2,
    “value”: “Gemunu”,
    “type”: “TEXT”,

    “id”: 3,

    “type”: “TEXT”,
    “caseSensitive”: false
    },

    “id”: 4,

    “message”: “error.validation”,
    “description”: null,
    “fieldErrors”: [
    {
    “objectName”: “”,
    “field”: “question.media”,
    “message”: “must match \“TEXT|HTML|IMAGE|VIDEO|AUDIO\“”
    }
    ]
    }

    $.descriptionnull

Create a question using an empty promptType

00:00:01
Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • Given that a user needs to invoke "Create MCQ Type Question"

    API Endpoint is:
    http://10.199.253.84:8070/api/questions

Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • And the user set the request authentication configurations as follows
    Configuration Property NameConfiguration Property Value
    isAccessTokenIncludedTrue
    isAccessTokenRetrievedFromTextFileTrue
    accessTokenStringN/A
Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • And the user set the request attributes as follows
    Attribute Value In JSON TemplateAttribute Value To Be Set
    #creatorIdosanda12
    #creatorPlatformWeb
    #creatoredSourceApp
    #creatoredTypeManual
    #deckId51
    #kindMULTIPLE_CHOICE
    #learningObjectivesobjective1
    #imageUrlhttps://documentservice-qa.stg-prsn.com/api/v1/documents/5a155f35d5b71d1a8a54dd58/download/public?format=ORIGINAL
    #mediaTEXT
    #questionPromptWho is the owner of MaxSoft?
    #promptType
    #timeout60
    #rationalerationale
    #boxId0
    #correctAttempts1
    #inCorrectAttempts0
    #lastAswered2018-01-01T12:00:00+01:00
    #questionId0
    #skips0
    #userId0
    #correctAnswerList1,2
    #answer1Id1
    #answer1ValueOsanda
    #answer1TypeTEXT
    #answer1CaseSensitivetrue
    #answer2Id2
    #answer2ValueGemunu
    #answer2TypeTEXT
    #answer2CaseSensitivetrue
    #answer3Id3
    #answer3ValueEranga
    #answer3TypeTEXT
    #answer3CaseSensitivefalse
    #answer4Id4
    #answer4ValueHeshan
    #answer4TypeTEXT
    #answer4CaseSensitivefalse
    #answer5Id5
    #answer5ValueThilina
    #answer5TypeTEXT
    #answer5CaseSensitivetrue
    #tagsMaxSoft

    The JSON request body that you are going to use for the API is:
    {
    “creatorId”: “osanda12”,
    “creatorPlatform”: “Web”,
    “creatoredSource”: “App”,
    “creatoredType”: “Manual”,
    “deckId”: 51,
    “kind”: “MULTIPLE_CHOICE”,
    “learningObjectives”: [
    “objective1”
    ],
    “question”: {
    “imageUrl”: “https://documentservice-qa.stg-prsn.com/api/v1/documents/5a155f35d5b71d1a8a54dd58/download/public?format=ORIGINAL",
    “media”: “TEXT”,
    “prompt”: “Who is the owner of MaxSoft?”,
    “promptType”: “”,
    “timeout”: 60
    },
    “rationale”: “rationale”,
    “stats”: {
    “boxId”: 0,
    “correctAttempts”: 1,
    “inCorrectAttempts”: 0,
    “lastAswered”: “2018-01-01T12:00:00+01:00”,
    “questionId”: 0,
    “skips”: 0,
    “userId”: 0
    },
    “correctAnswers”: [
    1,2
    ],
    “answers”: [
    {
    “id”: 1,
    “value”: “Osanda”,
    “type”: “TEXT”,
    “caseSensitive”: true
    },
    {
    “id”: 2,
    “value”: “Gemunu”,
    “type”: “TEXT”,
    “caseSensitive”: true
    },
    {
    “id”: 3,
    “value”: “Eranga”,
    “type”: “TEXT”,
    “caseSensitive”: false
    },
    {
    “id”: 4,
    “value”: “Heshan”,
    “type”: “TEXT”,
    “caseSensitive”: false
    },
    {
    “id”: 5,
    “value”: “Thilina”,
    “type”: “TEXT”,
    “caseSensitive”: true
    }
    ],
    “tags”: [
    “MaxSoft”
    ]
    }

Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • When the user invokes the API

    Reading the access token from the text file in the directory of “C:\Users\UnimaOs\IdeaProjects\Smart-Flashcards-API-Testing-Framework\resources\access_tokens\access_token_to_be_used_for_testing.txt” is succeeded

    Invoked API Endpoint:
    http://10.199.253.84:8070/api/questions

    Response is:
    {
    “message”: “error.validation”,
    “description”: null,
    “fieldErrors”: [
    {
    “objectName”: “”,
    “field”: “question.promptType”,
    “message”: “must match \“HTML|TEXT|IMAGE\“”
    }
    ]
    }

Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • Then the status code for the request is "400"
Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • And the JSON Path Assertions for the response should be equal to the following
    JSON PathValue
    $.messageerror.validation
    $.descriptionnull
    $.fieldErrors[0].objectName
    $.fieldErrors[0].fieldquestion.promptType
    $.fieldErrors[0].messagemust match "HTML|TEXT|IMAGE

Create a question using a string as the timeout

00:00:01
Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • Given that a user needs to invoke "Create MCQ Type Question"

    API Endpoint is:
    http://10.199.253.84:8070/api/questions

Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • And the user set the request authentication configurations as follows
    Configuration Property NameConfiguration Property Value
    isAccessTokenIncludedTrue
    isAccessTokenRetrievedFromTextFileTrue
    accessTokenStringN/A
Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • And the user set the request attributes as follows
    Attribute Value In JSON TemplateAttribute Value To Be Set
    #creatorIdosanda12
    #creatorPlatformWeb
    #creatoredSourceApp
    #creatoredTypeManual
    #deckId51
    #kindMULTIPLE_CHOICE
    #learningObjectivesobjective1
    #imageUrlhttps://documentservice-qa.stg-prsn.com/api/v1/documents/5a155f35d5b71d1a8a54dd58/download/public?format=ORIGINAL
    #mediaTEXT
    #questionPromptWho is the owner of MaxSoft?
    #promptTypeTEXT
    #timeouta0
    #rationalerationale
    #boxId0
    #correctAttempts1
    #inCorrectAttempts0
    #lastAswered2018-01-01T12:00:00+01:00
    #questionId0
    #skips0
    #userId0
    #correctAnswerList1,2
    #answer1Id1
    #answer1ValueOsanda
    #answer1TypeTEXT
    #answer1CaseSensitivetrue
    #answer2Id2
    #answer2ValueGemunu
    #answer2TypeTEXT
    #answer2CaseSensitivetrue
    #answer3Id3
    #answer3ValueEranga
    #answer3TypeTEXT
    #answer3CaseSensitivefalse
    #answer4Id4
    #answer4ValueHeshan
    #answer4TypeTEXT
    #answer4CaseSensitivefalse
    #answer5Id5
    #answer5ValueThilina
    #answer5TypeTEXT
    #answer5CaseSensitivetrue
    #tagsMaxSoft

    The JSON request body that you are going to use for the API is:
    {
    “creatorId”: “osanda12”,
    “creatorPlatform”: “Web”,
    “creatoredSource”: “App”,
    “creatoredType”: “Manual”,
    “deckId”: 51,
    “kind”: “MULTIPLE_CHOICE”,
    “learningObjectives”: [
    “objective1”
    ],
    “question”: {
    “imageUrl”: “https://documentservice-qa.stg-prsn.com/api/v1/documents/5a155f35d5b71d1a8a54dd58/download/public?format=ORIGINAL",
    “media”: “TEXT”,
    “prompt”: “Who is the owner of MaxSoft?”,
    “promptType”: “TEXT”,
    “timeout”: a0
    },
    “rationale”: “rationale”,
    “stats”: {
    “boxId”: 0,
    “correctAttempts”: 1,
    “inCorrectAttempts”: 0,
    “lastAswered”: “2018-01-01T12:00:00+01:00”,
    “questionId”: 0,
    “skips”: 0,
    “userId”: 0
    },
    “correctAnswers”: [
    1,2
    ],
    “answers”: [
    {
    “id”: 1,
    “value”: “Osanda”,
    “type”: “TEXT”,
    “caseSensitive”: true
    },
    {
    “id”: 2,
    “value”: “Gemunu”,
    “type”: “TEXT”,
    “caseSensitive”: true
    },
    {
    “id”: 3,
    “value”: “Eranga”,
    “type”: “TEXT”,
    “caseSensitive”: false
    },
    {
    “id”: 4,
    “value”: “Heshan”,
    “type”: “TEXT”,
    “caseSensitive”: false
    },
    {
    “id”: 5,
    “value”: “Thilina”,
    “type”: “TEXT”,
    “caseSensitive”: true
    }
    ],
    “tags”: [
    “MaxSoft”
    ]
    }

Execution Time : 00:00:01
  • When the user invokes the API

    Reading the access token from the text file in the directory of “C:\Users\UnimaOs\IdeaProjects\Smart-Flashcards-API-Testing-Framework\resources\access_tokens\access_token_to_be_used_for_testing.txt” is succeeded

    Invoked API Endpoint:
    http://10.199.253.84:8070/api/questions

    Response is:
    {
    “message”: “Unrecognized token ‘a0’: was expecting (‘true’, ‘false’ or ‘null’)\n at [Source: java.io.PushbackInputStream@7e619adc; line: 16, column: 19]“,
    “description”: null,
    “fieldErrors”: null
    }

Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • Then the status code for the request is "400"
Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • And the JSON Path Assertions for the response should be equal to the following
    JSON PathValue
    $.descriptionnull
    $.fieldErrorsnull

Create a question using an negative value as the timeout

00:00:01
Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • Given that a user needs to invoke "Create MCQ Type Question"

    API Endpoint is:
    http://10.199.253.84:8070/api/questions

Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • And the user set the request authentication configurations as follows
    Configuration Property NameConfiguration Property Value
    isAccessTokenIncludedTrue
    isAccessTokenRetrievedFromTextFileTrue
    accessTokenStringN/A
Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • And the user set the request attributes as follows
    Attribute Value In JSON TemplateAttribute Value To Be Set
    #creatorIdosanda12
    #creatorPlatformWeb
    #creatoredSourceApp
    #creatoredTypeManual
    #deckId51
    #kindMULTIPLE_CHOICE
    #learningObjectivesobjective1
    #imageUrlhttps://documentservice-qa.stg-prsn.com/api/v1/documents/5a155f35d5b71d1a8a54dd58/download/public?format=ORIGINAL
    #mediaTEXT
    #questionPromptWho is the owner of MaxSoft?
    #promptTypeTEXT
    #timeout-20
    #rationalerationale
    #boxId0
    #correctAttempts1
    #inCorrectAttempts0
    #lastAswered2018-01-01T12:00:00+01:00
    #questionId0
    #skips0
    #userId0
    #correctAnswerList1,2
    #answer1Id1
    #answer1ValueOsanda
    #answer1TypeTEXT
    #answer1CaseSensitivetrue
    #answer2Id2
    #answer2ValueGemunu
    #answer2TypeTEXT
    #answer2CaseSensitivetrue
    #answer3Id3
    #answer3ValueEranga
    #answer3TypeTEXT
    #answer3CaseSensitivefalse
    #answer4Id4
    #answer4ValueHeshan
    #answer4TypeTEXT
    #answer4CaseSensitivefalse
    #answer5Id5
    #answer5ValueThilina
    #answer5TypeTEXT
    #answer5CaseSensitivetrue
    #tagsMaxSoft

    The JSON request body that you are going to use for the API is:
    {
    “creatorId”: “osanda12”,
    “creatorPlatform”: “Web”,
    “creatoredSource”: “App”,
    “creatoredType”: “Manual”,
    “deckId”: 51,
    “kind”: “MULTIPLE_CHOICE”,
    “learningObjectives”: [
    “objective1”
    ],
    “question”: {
    “imageUrl”: “https://documentservice-qa.stg-prsn.com/api/v1/documents/5a155f35d5b71d1a8a54dd58/download/public?format=ORIGINAL",
    “media”: “TEXT”,
    “prompt”: “Who is the owner of MaxSoft?”,
    “promptType”: “TEXT”,
    “timeout”: -20
    },
    “rationale”: “rationale”,
    “stats”: {
    “boxId”: 0,
    “correctAttempts”: 1,
    “inCorrectAttempts”: 0,
    “lastAswered”: “2018-01-01T12:00:00+01:00”,
    “questionId”: 0,
    “skips”: 0,
    “userId”: 0
    },
    “correctAnswers”: [
    1,2
    ],
    “answers”: [
    {
    “id”: 1,
    “value”: “Osanda”,
    “type”: “TEXT”,
    “caseSensitive”: true
    },
    {
    “id”: 2,
    “value”: “Gemunu”,
    “type”: “TEXT”,
    “caseSensitive”: true
    },
    {
    “id”: 3,
    “value”: “Eranga”,
    “type”: “TEXT”,
    “caseSensitive”: false
    },
    {
    “id”: 4,
    “value”: “Heshan”,
    “type”: “TEXT”,
    “caseSensitive”: false
    },
    {
    “id”: 5,
    “value”: “Thilina”,
    “type”: “TEXT”,
    “caseSensitive”: true
    }
    ],
    “tags”: [
    “MaxSoft”
    ]
    }

Execution Time : 00:00:01
  • When the user invokes the API

    Reading the access token from the text file in the directory of “C:\Users\UnimaOs\IdeaProjects\Smart-Flashcards-API-Testing-Framework\resources\access_tokens\access_token_to_be_used_for_testing.txt” is succeeded

    Invoked API Endpoint:
    http://10.199.253.84:8070/api/questions

    Response is:
    {
    “message”: “error.validation”,
    “description”: null,
    “fieldErrors”: [
    {
    “objectName”: “”,
    “field”: “question.timeout”,
    “message”: “‘timeout’ should be zero or positive integer.”
    }
    ]
    }

Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • Then the status code for the request is "400"
Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • And the JSON Path Assertions for the response should be equal to the following
    JSON PathValue
    $.messageerror.validation
    $.descriptionnull
    $.fieldErrors[0].objectName
    $.fieldErrors[0].fieldquestion.timeout
    $.fieldErrors[0].message'timeout' should be zero or positive integer.

Create a question using a string value as the boxId

00:00:01
Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • Given that a user needs to invoke "Create MCQ Type Question"

    API Endpoint is:
    http://10.199.253.84:8070/api/questions

Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • And the user set the request authentication configurations as follows
    Configuration Property NameConfiguration Property Value
    isAccessTokenIncludedTrue
    isAccessTokenRetrievedFromTextFileTrue
    accessTokenStringN/A
Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • And the user set the request attributes as follows
    Attribute Value In JSON TemplateAttribute Value To Be Set
    #creatorIdosanda12
    #creatorPlatformWeb
    #creatoredSourceApp
    #creatoredTypeManual
    #deckId51
    #kindMULTIPLE_CHOICE
    #learningObjectivesobjective1
    #imageUrlhttps://documentservice-qa.stg-prsn.com/api/v1/documents/5a155f35d5b71d1a8a54dd58/download/public?format=ORIGINAL
    #mediaTEXT
    #questionPromptWho is the owner of MaxSoft?
    #promptTypeTEXT
    #timeout120
    #rationalerationale
    #boxIdboxId
    #correctAttempts1
    #inCorrectAttempts0
    #lastAswered2018-01-01T12:00:00+01:00
    #questionId0
    #skips0
    #userId0
    #correctAnswerList1,2
    #answer1Id1
    #answer1ValueOsanda
    #answer1TypeTEXT
    #answer1CaseSensitivetrue
    #answer2Id2
    #answer2ValueGemunu
    #answer2TypeTEXT
    #answer2CaseSensitivetrue
    #answer3Id3
    #answer3ValueEranga
    #answer3TypeTEXT
    #answer3CaseSensitivefalse
    #answer4Id4
    #answer4ValueHeshan
    #answer4TypeTEXT
    #answer4CaseSensitivefalse
    #answer5Id5
    #answer5ValueThilina
    #answer5TypeTEXT
    #answer5CaseSensitivetrue
    #tagsMaxSoft

    The JSON request body that you are going to use for the API is:
    {
    “creatorId”: “osanda12”,
    “creatorPlatform”: “Web”,
    “creatoredSource”: “App”,
    “creatoredType”: “Manual”,
    “deckId”: 51,
    “kind”: “MULTIPLE_CHOICE”,
    “learningObjectives”: [
    “objective1”
    ],
    “question”: {
    “imageUrl”: “https://documentservice-qa.stg-prsn.com/api/v1/documents/5a155f35d5b71d1a8a54dd58/download/public?format=ORIGINAL",
    “media”: “TEXT”,
    “prompt”: “Who is the owner of MaxSoft?”,
    “promptType”: “TEXT”,
    “timeout”: 120
    },
    “rationale”: “rationale”,
    “stats”: {
    “boxId”: boxId,
    “correctAttempts”: 1,
    “inCorrectAttempts”: 0,
    “lastAswered”: “2018-01-01T12:00:00+01:00”,
    “questionId”: 0,
    “skips”: 0,
    “userId”: 0
    },
    “correctAnswers”: [
    1,2
    ],
    “answers”: [
    {
    “id”: 1,
    “value”: “Osanda”,
    “type”: “TEXT”,
    “caseSensitive”: true
    },
    {
    “id”: 2,
    “value”: “Gemunu”,
    “type”: “TEXT”,
    “caseSensitive”: true
    },
    {
    “id”: 3,
    “value”: “Eranga”,
    “type”: “TEXT”,
    “caseSensitive”: false
    },
    {
    “id”: 4,
    “value”: “Heshan”,
    “type”: “TEXT”,
    “caseSensitive”: false
    },
    {
    “id”: 5,
    “value”: “Thilina”,
    “type”: “TEXT”,
    “caseSensitive”: true
    }
    ],
    “tags”: [
    “MaxSoft”
    ]
    }

Execution Time : 00:00:01
  • When the user invokes the API

    Reading the access token from the text file in the directory of “C:\Users\UnimaOs\IdeaProjects\Smart-Flashcards-API-Testing-Framework\resources\access_tokens\access_token_to_be_used_for_testing.txt” is succeeded

    Invoked API Endpoint:
    http://10.199.253.84:8070/api/questions

    Response is:
    {
    “message”: “Unrecognized token ‘boxId’: was expecting (‘true’, ‘false’ or ‘null’)\n at [Source: java.io.PushbackInputStream@7e58fe07; line: 20, column: 20]“,
    “description”: null,
    “fieldErrors”: null
    }

Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • Then the status code for the request is "400"
Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • And the JSON Path Assertions for the response should be equal to the following
    JSON PathValue
    $.descriptionnull
    $.fieldErrorsnull

Create a question using a negative integer value as the boxId

00:00:01
Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • Given that a user needs to invoke "Create MCQ Type Question"

    API Endpoint is:
    http://10.199.253.84:8070/api/questions

Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • And the user set the request authentication configurations as follows
    Configuration Property NameConfiguration Property Value
    isAccessTokenIncludedTrue
    isAccessTokenRetrievedFromTextFileTrue
    accessTokenStringN/A
Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • And the user set the request attributes as follows
    Attribute Value In JSON TemplateAttribute Value To Be Set
    #creatorIdosanda12
    #creatorPlatformWeb
    #creatoredSourceApp
    #creatoredTypeManual
    #deckId51
    #kindMULTIPLE_CHOICE
    #learningObjectivesobjective1
    #imageUrlhttps://documentservice-qa.stg-prsn.com/api/v1/documents/5a155f35d5b71d1a8a54dd58/download/public?format=ORIGINAL
    #mediaTEXT
    #questionPromptWho is the owner of MaxSoft?
    #promptTypeTEXT
    #timeout120
    #rationalerationale
    #boxId-1
    #correctAttempts1
    #inCorrectAttempts0
    #lastAswered2018-01-01T12:00:00+01:00
    #questionId0
    #skips0
    #userId0
    #correctAnswerList1,2
    #answer1Id1
    #answer1ValueOsanda
    #answer1TypeTEXT
    #answer1CaseSensitivetrue
    #answer2Id2
    #answer2ValueGemunu
    #answer2TypeTEXT
    #answer2CaseSensitivetrue
    #answer3Id3
    #answer3ValueEranga
    #answer3TypeTEXT
    #answer3CaseSensitivefalse
    #answer4Id4
    #answer4ValueHeshan
    #answer4TypeTEXT
    #answer4CaseSensitivefalse
    #answer5Id5
    #answer5ValueThilina
    #answer5TypeTEXT
    #answer5CaseSensitivetrue
    #tagsMaxSoft

    The JSON request body that you are going to use for the API is:
    {
    “creatorId”: “osanda12”,
    “creatorPlatform”: “Web”,
    “creatoredSource”: “App”,
    “creatoredType”: “Manual”,
    “deckId”: 51,
    “kind”: “MULTIPLE_CHOICE”,
    “learningObjectives”: [
    “objective1”
    ],
    “question”: {
    “imageUrl”: “https://documentservice-qa.stg-prsn.com/api/v1/documents/5a155f35d5b71d1a8a54dd58/download/public?format=ORIGINAL",
    “media”: “TEXT”,
    “prompt”: “Who is the owner of MaxSoft?”,
    “promptType”: “TEXT”,
    “timeout”: 120
    },
    “rationale”: “rationale”,
    “stats”: {
    “boxId”: -1,
    “correctAttempts”: 1,
    “inCorrectAttempts”: 0,
    “lastAswered”: “2018-01-01T12:00:00+01:00”,
    “questionId”: 0,
    “skips”: 0,
    “userId”: 0
    },
    “correctAnswers”: [
    1,2
    ],
    “answers”: [
    {
    “id”: 1,
    “value”: “Osanda”,
    “type”: “TEXT”,
    “caseSensitive”: true
    },
    {
    “id”: 2,
    “value”: “Gemunu”,
    “type”: “TEXT”,
    “caseSensitive”: true
    },
    {
    “id”: 3,
    “value”: “Eranga”,
    “type”: “TEXT”,
    “caseSensitive”: false
    },
    {
    “id”: 4,
    “value”: “Heshan”,
    “type”: “TEXT”,
    “caseSensitive”: false
    },
    {
    “id”: 5,
    “value”: “Thilina”,
    “type”: “TEXT”,
    “caseSensitive”: true
    }
    ],
    “tags”: [
    “MaxSoft”
    ]
    }

Execution Time : 00:00:01
  • When the user invokes the API

    Reading the access token from the text file in the directory of “C:\Users\UnimaOs\IdeaProjects\Smart-Flashcards-API-Testing-Framework\resources\access_tokens\access_token_to_be_used_for_testing.txt” is succeeded

    Invoked API Endpoint:
    http://10.199.253.84:8070/api/questions

    Response is:
    {
    “message”: “error.validation”,
    “description”: null,
    “fieldErrors”: [
    {
    “objectName”: “”,
    “field”: “stats.boxId”,
    “message”: “‘boxId’ should be zero or positive integer.”
    }
    ]
    }

Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • Then the status code for the request is "400"
Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • And the JSON Path Assertions for the response should be equal to the following
    JSON PathValue
    $.messageerror.validation
    $.descriptionnull
    $.fieldErrors[0].objectName
    $.fieldErrors[0].fieldstats.boxId
    $.fieldErrors[0].message'boxId' should be zero or positive integer.

Create a question using an empty value as the boxId

00:00:01
Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • Given that a user needs to invoke "Create MCQ Type Question"

    API Endpoint is:
    http://10.199.253.84:8070/api/questions

Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • And the user set the request authentication configurations as follows
    Configuration Property NameConfiguration Property Value
    isAccessTokenIncludedTrue
    isAccessTokenRetrievedFromTextFileTrue
    accessTokenStringN/A
Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • And the user set the request attributes as follows
    Attribute Value In JSON TemplateAttribute Value To Be Set
    #creatorIdosanda12
    #creatorPlatformWeb
    #creatoredSourceApp
    #creatoredTypeManual
    #deckId51
    #kindMULTIPLE_CHOICE
    #learningObjectivesobjective1
    #imageUrlhttps://documentservice-qa.stg-prsn.com/api/v1/documents/5a155f35d5b71d1a8a54dd58/download/public?format=ORIGINAL
    #mediaTEXT
    #questionPromptWho is the owner of MaxSoft?
    #promptTypeTEXT
    #timeout120
    #rationalerationale
    #boxId5.5
    #correctAttempts
    #inCorrectAttempts0
    #lastAswered2018-01-01T12:00:00+01:00
    #questionId0
    #skips0
    #userId0
    #correctAnswerList1,2
    #answer1Id1
    #answer1ValueOsanda
    #answer1TypeTEXT
    #answer1CaseSensitivetrue
    #answer2Id2
    #answer2ValueGemunu
    #answer2TypeTEXT
    #answer2CaseSensitivetrue
    #answer3Id3
    #answer3ValueEranga
    #answer3TypeTEXT
    #answer3CaseSensitivefalse
    #answer4Id4
    #answer4ValueHeshan
    #answer4TypeTEXT
    #answer4CaseSensitivefalse
    #answer5Id5
    #answer5ValueThilina
    #answer5TypeTEXT
    #answer5CaseSensitivetrue
    #tagsMaxSoft

    The JSON request body that you are going to use for the API is:
    {
    “creatorId”: “osanda12”,
    “creatorPlatform”: “Web”,

Create a question using a string value as the correctAttempts

00:00:01
Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • Given that a user needs to invoke "Create MCQ Type Question"

    API Endpoint is:
    http://10.199.253.84:8070/api/questions

Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • And the user set the request authentication configurations as follows
    Configuration Property NameConfiguration Property Value
    isAccessTokenIncludedTrue
    isAccessTokenRetrievedFromTextFileTrue
    accessTokenStringN/A
Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • And the user set the request attributes as follows
    Attribute Value In JSON TemplateAttribute Value To Be Set
    #creatorIdosanda12
    #creatorPlatformWeb
    #creatoredSourceApp
    #creatoredTypeManual
    #deckId51
    #kindMULTIPLE_CHOICE
    #learningObjectivesobjective1
    #imageUrlhttps://documentservice-qa.stg-prsn.com/api/v1/documents/5a155f35d5b71d1a8a54dd58/download/public?format=ORIGINAL

    #questionPromptWho is the owner of MaxSoft?
    #promptTypeTEXT
    #timeout120
    #rationalerationale
    #boxId1
    #correctAttemptscorrectAt1
    #inCorrectAttempts0
    #lastAswered2018-01-01T12:00:00+01:00
    #questionId0
    #skips0
    #userId0
    #correctAnswerList1,2
    #answer1Id1
    #answer1ValueOsanda
    #answer1TypeTEXT
    #answer1CaseSensitivetrue
    #answer2Id2
    #answer2ValueGemunu
    #answer2TypeTEXT
    #answer2CaseSensitivetrue
    #answer3Id3
    #answer3ValueEranga
    #answer3TypeTEXT
    #answer3CaseSensitivefalse
    #answer4Id4
    #answer4ValueHeshan
    #answer4TypeTEXT
    #answer4CaseSensitivefalse
    #answer5Id5
    #answer5ValueThilina
    #answer5TypeTEXT
    #answer5CaseSensitivetrue
    #tagsMaxSoft

    “promptType”: “TEXT”,
    “timeout”: 120
    },

    “boxId”: 1,
    “correctAttempts”: correctAt1,
    “inCorrectAttempts”: 0,

    “userId”: 0

    1,2

Create a question using a string value as the inCorrectAttempts

00:00:00
Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • Given that a user needs to invoke "Create MCQ Type Question"

    API Endpoint is:
    http://10.199.253.84:8070/api/questions

Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • And the user set the request authentication configurations as follows
    Configuration Property NameConfiguration Property Value
    isAccessTokenIncludedTrue
    isAccessTokenRetrievedFromTextFileTrue
    accessTokenStringN/A
Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • And the user set the request attributes as follows
    Attribute Value In JSON TemplateAttribute Value To Be Set
    #creatorIdosanda12
    #creatorPlatformWeb
    #creatoredSourceApp
    #creatoredTypeManual
    #deckId51
    #kindMULTIPLE_CHOICE
    #learningObjectivesobjective1
    #imageUrlhttps://documentservice-qa.stg-prsn.com/api/v1/documents/5a155f35d5b71d1a8a54dd58/download/public?format=ORIGINAL
    #mediaTEXT
    #questionPromptWho is the owner of MaxSoft?
    #promptTypeTEXT
    #timeout120
    #rationalerationale
    #boxId1
    #correctAttempts1
    #inCorrectAttemptsa
    #lastAswered2018-01-01T12:00:00+01:00
    #questionId0
    #skips0
    #userId0
    #correctAnswerList1,2
    #answer1Id1
    #answer1ValueOsanda
    #answer1TypeTEXT
    #answer1CaseSensitivetrue
    #answer2Id2
    #answer2ValueGemunu
    #answer2TypeTEXT
    #answer2CaseSensitivetrue
    #answer3Id3
    #answer3ValueEranga
    #answer3TypeTEXT
    #answer3CaseSensitivefalse
    #answer4Id4
    #answer4ValueHeshan
    #answer4TypeTEXT
    #answer4CaseSensitivefalse
    #answer5Id5
    #answer5ValueThilina
    #answer5TypeTEXT
    #answer5CaseSensitivetrue
    #tagsMaxSoft

    The JSON request body that you are going to use for the API is:
    {
    “creatorId”: “osanda12”,
    “creatorPlatform”: “Web”,
    “creatoredSource”: “App”,
    “creatoredType”: “Manual”,
    “deckId”: 51,
    “kind”: “MULTIPLE_CHOICE”,
    “learningObjectives”: [
    “objective1”
    ],
    “question”: {
    “imageUrl”: “https://documentservice-qa.stg-prsn.com/api/v1/documents/5a155f35d5b71d1a8a54dd58/download/public?format=ORIGINAL",
    “media”: “TEXT”,
    “prompt”: “Who is the owner of MaxSoft?”,
    “promptType”: “TEXT”,
    “timeout”: 120
    },
    “rationale”: “rationale”,
    “stats”: {
    “boxId”: 1,
    “correctAttempts”: 1,
    “inCorrectAttempts”: a,
    “lastAswered”: “2018-01-01T12:00:00+01:00”,
    “questionId”: 0,
    “skips”: 0,
    “userId”: 0
    },
    “correctAnswers”: [
    1,2
    ],
    “answers”: [
    {
    “id”: 1,
    “value”: “Osanda”,
    “type”: “TEXT”,
    “caseSensitive”: true
    },
    {
    “id”: 2,
    “value”: “Gemunu”,
    “type”: “TEXT”,
    “caseSensitive”: true
    },
    {
    “id”: 3,
    “value”: “Eranga”,
    “type”: “TEXT”,
    “caseSensitive”: false
    },
    {
    “id”: 4,
    “value”: “Heshan”,
    “type”: “TEXT”,
    “caseSensitive”: false
    },
    {
    “id”: 5,
    “value”: “Thilina”,
    “type”: “TEXT”,
    “caseSensitive”: true
    }
    ],
    “tags”: [
    “MaxSoft”
    ]
    }

    #tagsMaxSoft

    #answer3Id3
    #answer3ValueEranga
    #answer3TypeTEXT
    #answer3CaseSensitivefalse
    #answer4Id4
    #answer4ValueHeshan
    #answer4TypeTEXT
    #answer4CaseSensitivefalse
    #answer5Id5
    #answer5ValueThilina
    #answer5TypeTEXT
    #answer5CaseSensitivetrue
    #tagsMaxSoft

    The JSON request body that you are going to use for the API is:
    {
    “creatorId”: “osanda12”,
    “creatorPlatform”: “Web”,
    “creatoredSource”: “App”,
    “creatoredType”: “Manual”,
    “deckId”: 51,
    “kind”: “MULTIPLE_CHOICE”,
    “learningObjectives”: [
    “objective1”
    ],
    “question”: {
    “imageUrl”: “https://documentservice-qa.stg-prsn.com/api/v1/documents/5a155f35d5b71d1a8a54dd58/download/public?format=ORIGINAL",
    “media”: “TEXT”,
    “prompt”: “Who is the owner of MaxSoft?”,
    “promptType”: “TEXT”,
    “timeout”: 120
    },
    “rationale”: “rationale”,
    “stats”: {
    “boxId”: 1,
    “correctAttempts”: 1,
    “inCorrectAttempts”: 0,
    “lastAswered”: “abc”,
    “questionId”: 0,
    “skips”: 0,
    “userId”: 0
    },
    “correctAnswers”: [
    1,2
    ],
    “answers”: [
    {
    “id”: 1,
    “value”: “Osanda”,
    “type”: “TEXT”,
    “caseSensitive”: true
    },
    {
    “id”: 2,
    “value”: “Gemunu”,
    “type”: “TEXT”,
    “caseSensitive”: true
    },
    {
    “id”: 3,
    “value”: “Eranga”,
    “type”: “TEXT”,
    “caseSensitive”: false
    },
    {
    “id”: 4,
    “value”: “Heshan”,
    “type”: “TEXT”,
    “caseSensitive”: false
    },
    {
    “id”: 5,
    “value”: “Thilina”,
    “type”: “TEXT”,
    “caseSensitive”: true
    }
    ],
    “tags”: [
    “MaxSoft”
    ]
    }

Create a question using an empty creatoredType

00:00:01
Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • Given that a user needs to invoke "Create MCQ Type Question"

    API Endpoint is:
    http://10.199.253.84:8070/api/questions

Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • And the user set the request authentication configurations as follows
    Configuration Property NameConfiguration Property Value
    isAccessTokenIncludedTrue
    isAccessTokenRetrievedFromTextFileTrue
    accessTokenStringN/A
Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • And the user set the request attributes as follows
    Attribute Value In JSON TemplateAttribute Value To Be Set
    #creatorIdosanda12
    #creatorPlatformWeb
    #creatoredSourceApp
    #creatoredTypeManua
    #deckId51
    #kindMULTIPLE_CHOICE
    #learningObjectiveslearningObjective1
    #imageUrlhttps://documentservice-qa.stg-prsn.com/api/v1/documents/5a155f35d5b71d1a8a54dd58/download/public?format=ORIGINAL
    #mediaTEXT
    #questionPromptWho is the owner of MaxSoft? _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _
    #promptTypeTEXT
    #timeout60
    #rationalerationale
    #boxId0
    #correctAttempts1
    #inCorrectAttempts0
    #lastAswered2018-01-01T12:00:00+01:00
    #questionId0
    #skips0
    #userId0
    #correctAnswerList1,2
    #answer1Id1
    #answer1ValueOsanda
    #answer1TypeTEXT
    #answer1CaseSensitivetrue
    #answer2Id2
    #answer2ValueGemunu
    #answer2TypeTEXT
    #answer2CaseSensitivetrue
    #answer3Id3
    #answer3ValueEranga
    #answer3TypeTEXT
    #answer3CaseSensitivefalse
    #answer4Id4
    #answer4ValueHeshan
    #answer4TypeTEXT
    #answer4CaseSensitivefalse
    #answer5Id5
    #answer5ValueThilina
    #answer5TypeTEXT
    #answer5CaseSensitivetrue
    #tagsMaxSoft

    The JSON request body that you are going to use for the API is:
    {
    “creatorId”: “osanda12”,
    “creatorPlatform”: “Web”,
    “creatoredSource”: “App”,
    “creatoredType”: “Manua”,
    “deckId”: 51,
    “kind”: “MULTIPLE_CHOICE”,
    “learningObjectives”: [
    “learningObjective1”
    ],
    “question”: {
    “imageUrl”: “https://documentservice-qa.stg-prsn.com/api/v1/documents/5a155f35d5b71d1a8a54dd58/download/public?format=ORIGINAL",
    “media”: “TEXT”,
    “prompt”: “Who is the owner of MaxSoft? _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _“,
    “promptType”: “TEXT”,
    “timeout”: 60
    },
    “rationale”: “rationale”,
    “stats”: {
    “boxId”: 0,
    “correctAttempts”: 1,
    “inCorrectAttempts”: 0,
    “lastAswered”: “2018-01-01T12:00:00+01:00”,
    “questionId”: 0,
    “skips”: 0,
    “userId”: 0
    },
    “correctAnswers”: [
    1,2
    ],
    “answers”: [
    {
    “id”: 1,
    “value”: “Osanda”,
    “type”: “TEXT”,
    “caseSensitive”: true
    },
    {
    “id”: 2,
    “value”: “Gemunu”,
    “type”: “TEXT”,
    “caseSensitive”: true
    },
    {
    “id”: 3,
    “value”: “Eranga”,
    “type”: “TEXT”,
    “caseSensitive”: false
    },
    {
    “id”: 4,
    “value”: “Heshan”,
    “type”: “TEXT”,
    “caseSensitive”: false
    },
    {
    “id”: 5,
    “value”: “Thilina”,
    “type”: “TEXT”,
    “caseSensitive”: true
    }
    ],
    “tags”: [
    “MaxSoft”
    ]
    }

Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • When the user invokes the API

    Reading the access token from the text file in the directory of “C:\Users\UnimaOs\IdeaProjects\Smart-Flashcards-API-Testing-Framework\resources\access_tokens\access_token_to_be_used_for_testing.txt” is succeeded

    Invoked API Endpoint:
    http://10.199.253.84:8070/api/questions

    Response is:
    {
    “message”: “error.validation”,
    “description”: null,
    “fieldErrors”: [
    {
    “objectName”: “”,
    “field”: “creatoredType”,
    “message”: “must match \“Auto|Manual\“”
    }
    ]
    }

Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • Then the status code for the request is "400"
Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • And the JSON Path Assertions for the response should be equal to the following
    JSON PathValue
    $.messageerror.validation
    $.descriptionnull
    $.fieldErrors[0].objectName
    $.fieldErrors[0].fieldcreatoredType

00:00:00
Execution Time : 00:00:00

    Attribute Value In JSON TemplateAttribute Value To Be Set
    #creatorIdosanda12
    #creatorPlatformWeb
    #creatoredSourceApp
    #creatoredTypeManual
    #deckId51
    #kindMULTIPLE_CHOICE

    #questionPromptWho is the owner of MaxSoft?
    #promptTypeTEXT
    #timeout120
    #rationalerationale
    #boxId1
    #correctAttempts1
    #inCorrectAttempts0
    #lastAswered@#
    #questionId0
    #skips0
    #userId0

    #tagsMaxSoft

Create a question using an empty value as the questionId

00:00:00
Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • Given that a user needs to invoke "Create MCQ Type Question"

    API Endpoint is:
    http://10.199.253.84:8070/api/questions

Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • And the user set the request authentication configurations as follows
    Configuration Property NameConfiguration Property Value
    isAccessTokenIncludedTrue
    isAccessTokenRetrievedFromTextFileTrue
    accessTokenStringN/A
Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • And the user set the request attributes as follows
    Attribute Value In JSON TemplateAttribute Value To Be Set
    #creatorIdosanda12
    #creatorPlatformWeb
    #creatoredSourceApp
    #creatoredTypeManual
    #deckId51
    #kindMULTIPLE_CHOICE
    #learningObjectivesobjective1
    #imageUrlhttps://documentservice-qa.stg-prsn.com/api/v1/documents/5a155f35d5b71d1a8a54dd58/download/public?format=ORIGINAL
    #mediaTEXT
    #questionPromptWho is the owner of MaxSoft?
    #promptTypeTEXT
    #timeout120
    #rationalerationale
    #boxId1
    #correctAttempts1
    #inCorrectAttempts0
    #lastAswered2018-01-01T12:00:00+01:00
    #questionId
    #skips0
    #userId0
    #correctAnswerList1,2
    #answer1Id1
    #answer1ValueOsanda
    #answer1TypeTEXT
    #answer1CaseSensitivetrue
    #answer2Id2
    #answer2ValueGemunu
    #answer2TypeTEXT
    #answer2CaseSensitivetrue
    #answer3Id3
    #answer3ValueEranga
    #answer3TypeTEXT
    #answer3CaseSensitivefalse
    #answer4Id4
    #answer4ValueHeshan
    #answer4TypeTEXT
    #answer4CaseSensitivefalse
    #answer5Id5
    #answer5ValueThilina
    #answer5TypeTEXT
    #answer5CaseSensitivetrue
    #tagsMaxSoft

    The JSON request body that you are going to use for the API is:
    {
    “creatorId”: “osanda12”,
    “creatorPlatform”: “Web”,
    “creatoredSource”: “App”,
    “creatoredType”: “Manual”,
    “deckId”: 51,
    “kind”: “MULTIPLE_CHOICE”,
    “learningObjectives”: [
    “objective1”
    ],
    “question”: {
    “imageUrl”: “https://documentservice-qa.stg-prsn.com/api/v1/documents/5a155f35d5b71d1a8a54dd58/download/public?format=ORIGINAL",
    “media”: “TEXT”,
    “prompt”: “Who is the owner of MaxSoft?”,
    “promptType”: “TEXT”,
    “timeout”: 120
    },
    “rationale”: “rationale”,
    “stats”: {
    “boxId”: 1,
    “correctAttempts”: 1,
    “inCorrectAttempts”: 0,
    “lastAswered”: “2018-01-01T12:00:00+01:00”,
    “questionId”: ,
    “skips”: 0,
    “userId”: 0
    },
    “correctAnswers”: [
    1,2
    ],
    “answers”: [
    {
    “id”: 1,
    “value”: “Osanda”,
    “type”: “TEXT”,
    “caseSensitive”: true
    },
    {
    “id”: 2,
    “value”: “Gemunu”,
    “type”: “TEXT”,
    “caseSensitive”: true
    },
    {
    “id”: 3,
    “value”: “Eranga”,
    “type”: “TEXT”,
    “caseSensitive”: false
    },
    {
    “id”: 4,
    “value”: “Heshan”,
    “type”: “TEXT”,
    “caseSensitive”: false
    },
    {
    “id”: 5,
    “value”: “Thilina”,
    “type”: “TEXT”,
    “caseSensitive”: true
    }
    ],
    “tags”: [
    “MaxSoft”
    ]
    }

Create a question using a negative integer value as the skips

00:00:00
Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • Given that a user needs to invoke "Create MCQ Type Question"

    API Endpoint is:
    http://10.199.253.84:8070/api/questions

Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • And the user set the request authentication configurations as follows
    Configuration Property NameConfiguration Property Value
    isAccessTokenIncludedTrue
    isAccessTokenRetrievedFromTextFileTrue
    accessTokenStringN/A
Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • And the user set the request attributes as follows
    Attribute Value In JSON TemplateAttribute Value To Be Set
    #creatorIdosanda12
    #creatorPlatformWeb
    #creatoredSourceApp
    #creatoredTypeManual
    #deckId51
    #kindMULTIPLE_CHOICE
    #learningObjectivesobjective1
    #imageUrlhttps://documentservice-qa.stg-prsn.com/api/v1/documents/5a155f35d5b71d1a8a54dd58/download/public?format=ORIGINAL
    #mediaTEXT
    #questionPromptWho is the owner of MaxSoft?
    #promptTypeTEXT
    #timeout120
    #rationalerationale
    #boxId1
    #correctAttempts1
    #inCorrectAttempts0
    #lastAswered2018-01-01T12:00:00+01:00
    #questionId0
    #skips-1
    #userId0
    #correctAnswerList1,2
    #answer1Id1
    #answer1ValueOsanda
    #answer1TypeTEXT
    #answer1CaseSensitivetrue
    #answer2Id2
    #answer2ValueGemunu
    #answer2TypeTEXT
    #answer2CaseSensitivetrue
    #answer3Id3
    #answer3ValueEranga
    #answer3TypeTEXT
    #answer3CaseSensitivefalse
    #answer4Id4
    #answer4ValueHeshan
    #answer4TypeTEXT
    #answer4CaseSensitivefalse
    #answer5Id5
    #answer5ValueThilina
    #answer5TypeTEXT
    #answer5CaseSensitivetrue
    #tagsMaxSoft

    The JSON request body that you are going to use for the API is:
    {
    “creatorId”: “osanda12”,
    “creatorPlatform”: “Web”,
    “creatoredSource”: “App”,
    “creatoredType”: “Manual”,
    “deckId”: 51,
    “kind”: “MULTIPLE_CHOICE”,
    “learningObjectives”: [
    “objective1”
    ],
    “question”: {
    “imageUrl”: “https://documentservice-qa.stg-prsn.com/api/v1/documents/5a155f35d5b71d1a8a54dd58/download/public?format=ORIGINAL",
    “media”: “TEXT”,
    “prompt”: “Who is the owner of MaxSoft?”,
    “promptType”: “TEXT”,
    “timeout”: 120
    },
    “rationale”: “rationale”,
    “stats”: {
    “boxId”: 1,
    “correctAttempts”: 1,
    “inCorrectAttempts”: 0,
    “lastAswered”: “2018-01-01T12:00:00+01:00”,
    “questionId”: 0,
    “skips”: -1,
    “userId”: 0
    },
    “correctAnswers”: [
    1,2
    ],
    “answers”: [
    {
    “id”: 1,
    “value”: “Osanda”,
    “type”: “TEXT”,
    “caseSensitive”: true
    },
    {
    “id”: 2,
    “value”: “Gemunu”,
    “type”: “TEXT”,
    “caseSensitive”: true
    },
    {
    “id”: 3,
    “value”: “Eranga”,
    “type”: “TEXT”,
    “caseSensitive”: false
    },
    {
    “id”: 4,
    “value”: “Heshan”,
    “type”: “TEXT”,
    “caseSensitive”: false
    },
    {
    “id”: 5,
    “value”: “Thilina”,
    “type”: “TEXT”,
    “caseSensitive”: true
    }
    ],
    “tags”: [
    “MaxSoft”
    ]
    }

  • When the user invokes the API

    Reading the access token from the text file in the directory of “C:\Users\UnimaOs\IdeaProjects\Smart-Flashcards-API-Testing-Framework\resources\access_tokens\access_token_to_be_used_for_testing.txt” is succeeded

    Invoked API Endpoint:
    http://10.199.253.84:8070/api/questions

    Response is:
    {
    “message”: “error.validation”,
    “description”: null,
    “fieldErrors”: [
    {
    “objectName”: “”,
    “field”: “stats.skips”,
    “message”: “‘skips’ should be zero or positive integer.”
    }
    ]
    }

    JSON PathValue
    $.messageerror.validation
    $.descriptionnull
    $.fieldErrors[0].objectName
    $.fieldErrors[0].fieldstats.skips
    $.fieldErrors[0].message'skips' should be zero or positive integer.

Create a question using a special characters value as the skips

00:00:00
Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • Given that a user needs to invoke "Create MCQ Type Question"

    API Endpoint is:
    http://10.199.253.84:8070/api/questions

Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • And the user set the request authentication configurations as follows
    Configuration Property NameConfiguration Property Value
    isAccessTokenIncludedTrue
    isAccessTokenRetrievedFromTextFileTrue
    accessTokenStringN/A
Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • And the user set the request attributes as follows
    Attribute Value In JSON TemplateAttribute Value To Be Set
    #creatorIdosanda12
    #creatorPlatformWeb
    #creatoredSourceApp
    #creatoredTypeManual
    #deckId51
    #kindMULTIPLE_CHOICE
    #learningObjectivesobjective1
    #imageUrlhttps://documentservice-qa.stg-prsn.com/api/v1/documents/5a155f35d5b71d1a8a54dd58/download/public?format=ORIGINAL
    #mediaTEXT
    #questionPromptWho is the owner of MaxSoft?
    #promptTypeTEXT
    #timeout120
    #rationalerationale
    #boxId1
    #correctAttempts1
    #inCorrectAttempts0
    #lastAswered2018-01-01T12:00:00+01:00
    #questionId0
    #skips@#$
    #userId0
    #correctAnswerList1,2
    #answer1Id1
    #answer1ValueOsanda
    #answer1TypeTEXT
    #answer1CaseSensitivetrue
    #answer2Id2
    #answer2ValueGemunu
    #answer2TypeTEXT
    #answer2CaseSensitivetrue
    #answer3Id3
    #answer3ValueEranga
    #answer3TypeTEXT
    #answer3CaseSensitivefalse
    #answer4Id4
    #answer4ValueHeshan
    #answer4TypeTEXT
    #answer4CaseSensitivefalse
    #answer5Id5
    #answer5ValueThilina
    #answer5TypeTEXT
    #answer5CaseSensitivetrue
    #tagsMaxSoft

    The JSON request body that you are going to use for the API is:
    {
    “creatorId”: “osanda12”,
    “creatorPlatform”: “Web”,
    “creatoredSource”: “App”,
    “creatoredType”: “Manual”,
    “deckId”: 51,
    “kind”: “MULTIPLE_CHOICE”,
    “learningObjectives”: [
    “objective1”
    ],
    “question”: {
    “imageUrl”: “https://documentservice-qa.stg-prsn.com/api/v1/documents/5a155f35d5b71d1a8a54dd58/download/public?format=ORIGINAL",
    “media”: “TEXT”,
    “prompt”: “Who is the owner of MaxSoft?”,
    “promptType”: “TEXT”,
    “timeout”: 120
    },
    “rationale”: “rationale”,
    “stats”: {
    “boxId”: 1,
    “correctAttempts”: 1,
    “inCorrectAttempts”: 0,
    “lastAswered”: “2018-01-01T12:00:00+01:00”,
    “questionId”: 0,

    “userId”: 0
    },
    “correctAnswers”: [
    1,2
    ],
    “answers”: [
    {
    “id”: 1,
    “value”: “Osanda”,
    “type”: “TEXT”,
    “caseSensitive”: true
    },

    “id”: 2,
    “value”: “Gemunu”,

    #lastAswered2018-01-01T12:00:00+01:00
    #questionId0
    #skips0
    #userId-1
    #correctAnswerList1,2
    #answer1Id1
    #answer1ValueOsanda
    #answer1TypeTEXT
    #answer1CaseSensitivetrue
    #answer2Id2
    #answer2ValueGemunu
    #answer2TypeTEXT
    #answer2CaseSensitivetrue
    #answer3Id3
    #answer3ValueEranga
    #answer3TypeTEXT
    #answer3CaseSensitivefalse
    #answer4Id4
    #answer4ValueHeshan
    #answer4TypeTEXT
    #answer4CaseSensitivefalse
    #answer5Id5
    #answer5ValueThilina
    #answer5TypeTEXT
    #answer5CaseSensitivetrue
    #tagsMaxSoft

    The JSON request body that you are going to use for the API is:
    {
    “creatorId”: “osanda12”,
    “creatorPlatform”: “Web”,
    “creatoredSource”: “App”,
    “creatoredType”: “Manual”,
    “deckId”: 51,
    “kind”: “MULTIPLE_CHOICE”,
    “learningObjectives”: [
    “objective1”
    ],
    “question”: {
    “imageUrl”: “https://documentservice-qa.stg-prsn.com/api/v1/documents/5a155f35d5b71d1a8a54dd58/download/public?format=ORIGINAL",
    “media”: “TEXT”,
    “prompt”: “Who is the owner of MaxSoft?”,
    “promptType”: “TEXT”,
    “timeout”: 120
    },
    “rationale”: “rationale”,
    “stats”: {
    “boxId”: 1,
    “correctAttempts”: 1,
    “inCorrectAttempts”: 0,
    “lastAswered”: “2018-01-01T12:00:00+01:00”,
    “questionId”: 0,
    “skips”: 0,
    “userId”: -1
    },
    “correctAnswers”: [
    1,2
    ],
    “answers”: [
    {
    “id”: 1,
    “value”: “Osanda”,
    “type”: “TEXT”,
    “caseSensitive”: true
    },
    {
    “id”: 2,
    “value”: “Gemunu”,
    “type”: “TEXT”,
    “caseSensitive”: true
    },
    {
    “id”: 3,
    “value”: “Eranga”,
    “type”: “TEXT”,
    “caseSensitive”: false
    },
    {
    “id”: 4,
    “value”: “Heshan”,
    “type”: “TEXT”,
    “caseSensitive”: false
    },
    {
    “id”: 5,
    “value”: “Thilina”,
    “type”: “TEXT”,
    “caseSensitive”: true
    }
    ],
    “tags”: [
    “MaxSoft”
    ]
    }

Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • When the user invokes the API

    Reading the access token from the text file in the directory of “C:\Users\UnimaOs\IdeaProjects\Smart-Flashcards-API-Testing-Framework\resources\access_tokens\access_token_to_be_used_for_testing.txt” is succeeded

    Invoked API Endpoint:
    http://10.199.253.84:8070/api/questions

    Response is:
    {
    “message”: “error.validation”,
    “description”: null,
    “fieldErrors”: [
    {
    “objectName”: “”,
    “field”: “stats.userId”,
    “message”: “‘userId’ should be zero or positive integer.”
    }
    ]
    }

Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • Then the status code for the request is "400"
Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • And the JSON Path Assertions for the response should be equal to the following
    JSON PathValue
    $.messageerror.validation
    $.descriptionnull
    $.fieldErrors[0].objectName
    $.fieldErrors[0].fieldstats.userId
    $.fieldErrors[0].message'userId' should be zero or positive integer.

Create a question using a string value as the userId

00:00:00
Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • Given that a user needs to invoke "Create MCQ Type Question"

    API Endpoint is:
    http://10.199.253.84:8070/api/questions

    Configuration Property NameConfiguration Property Value
    isAccessTokenIncludedTrue
    isAccessTokenRetrievedFromTextFileTrue
    accessTokenStringN/A
Execution Time : 00:00:00

    Attribute Value In JSON TemplateAttribute Value To Be Set
    #creatorIdosanda12
    #creatorPlatformWeb
    #creatoredSourceApp
    #creatoredTypeManual
    #deckId51
    #kindMULTIPLE_CHOICE

    #questionPromptWho is the owner of MaxSoft?
    #promptTypeTEXT
    #timeout120
    #rationalerationale
    #boxId1

    #inCorrectAttempts0

    #skips0

    #answer5ValueThilina
    #answer5TypeTEXT
    #answer5CaseSensitivetrue
    #tagsMaxSoft

00:00:00

    Attribute Value In JSON TemplateAttribute Value To Be Set

    #creatorPlatformWeb

    #creatoredTypeManual
    #deckId51
    #kindMULTIPLE_CHOICE

    #questionPromptWho is the owner of MaxSoft?
    #promptTypeTEXT
    #timeout120
    #rationalerationale
    #boxId1
    #correctAttempts1
    #inCorrectAttempts0
    #lastAswered2018-01-01T12:00:00+01:00

    #tagsMaxSoft

    {
    “id”: 3,
    “value”: “Eranga”,
    “type”: “TEXT”,
    “caseSensitive”: false
    },
    {
    “id”: 4,
    “value”: “Heshan”,
    “type”: “TEXT”,
    “caseSensitive”: false
    },
    {
    “id”: 5,
    “value”: “Thilina”,
    “type”: “TEXT”,
    “caseSensitive”: true
    }
    ],
    “tags”: [
    “MaxSoft”
    ]
    }

Execution Time : 00:00:01
  • When the user invokes the API

    Reading the access token from the text file in the directory of “C:\Users\UnimaOs\IdeaProjects\Smart-Flashcards-API-Testing-Framework\resources\access_tokens\access_token_to_be_used_for_testing.txt” is succeeded

    Invoked API Endpoint:
    http://10.199.253.84:8070/api/questions

    Response is:
    {
    “message”: “Unexpected character (‘@’ (code 64)): expected a valid value (number, String, array, object, ‘true’, ‘false’ or ‘null’)\n at [Source: java.io.PushbackInputStream@111a333e; line: 29, column: 10]“,
    “description”: null,
    “fieldErrors”: null
    }

    JSON PathValue

    $.fieldErrorsnull

Create a question using an empty value as the correctAnswerList

00:00:00
Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • Given that a user needs to invoke "Create MCQ Type Question"

    API Endpoint is:
    http://10.199.253.84:8070/api/questions

Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • And the user set the request authentication configurations as follows
    Configuration Property NameConfiguration Property Value
    isAccessTokenIncludedTrue
    isAccessTokenRetrievedFromTextFileTrue
    accessTokenStringN/A
Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • And the user set the request attributes as follows
    Attribute Value In JSON TemplateAttribute Value To Be Set
    #creatorIdosanda12
    #creatorPlatformWeb
    #creatoredSourceApp
    #creatoredTypeManual
    #deckId51
    #kindMULTIPLE_CHOICE
    #learningObjectivesobjective1
    #imageUrlhttps://documentservice-qa.stg-prsn.com/api/v1/documents/5a155f35d5b71d1a8a54dd58/download/public?format=ORIGINAL
    #mediaTEXT
    #questionPromptWho is the owner of MaxSoft?
    #promptTypeTEXT
    #timeout120
    #rationalerationale
    #boxId1
    #correctAttempts1
    #inCorrectAttempts0
    #lastAswered2018-01-01T12:00:00+01:00
    #questionId0
    #skips0
    #userId1
    #correctAnswerList
    #answer1Id1
    #answer1ValueOsanda
    #answer1TypeTEXT
    #answer1CaseSensitivetrue
    #answer2Id2
    #answer2ValueGemunu
    #answer2TypeTEXT
    #answer2CaseSensitivetrue
    #answer3Id3
    #answer3ValueEranga
    #answer3TypeTEXT
    #answer3CaseSensitivefalse
    #answer4Id4
    #answer4ValueHeshan
    #answer4TypeTEXT
    #answer4CaseSensitivefalse
    #answer5Id5
    #answer5ValueThilina
    #answer5TypeTEXT
    #answer5CaseSensitivetrue
    #tagsMaxSoft

    The JSON request body that you are going to use for the API is:
    {
    “creatorId”: “osanda12”,
    “creatorPlatform”: “Web”,
    “creatoredSource”: “App”,
    “creatoredType”: “Manual”,
    “deckId”: 51,
    “kind”: “MULTIPLE_CHOICE”,
    “learningObjectives”: [
    “objective1”
    ],
    “question”: {
    “imageUrl”: “https://documentservice-qa.stg-prsn.com/api/v1/documents/5a155f35d5b71d1a8a54dd58/download/public?format=ORIGINAL",
    “media”: “TEXT”,
    “prompt”: “Who is the owner of MaxSoft?”,
    “promptType”: “TEXT”,
    “timeout”: 120
    },
    “rationale”: “rationale”,
    “stats”: {
    “boxId”: 1,
    “correctAttempts”: 1,
    “inCorrectAttempts”: 0,
    “lastAswered”: “2018-01-01T12:00:00+01:00”,
    “questionId”: 0,
    “skips”: 0,
    “userId”: 1
    },
    “correctAnswers”: [

    ],
    “answers”: [
    {
    “id”: 1,
    “value”: “Osanda”,
    “type”: “TEXT”,
    “caseSensitive”: true
    },
    {
    “id”: 2,
    “value”: “Gemunu”,
    “type”: “TEXT”,
    “caseSensitive”: true
    },
    {
    “id”: 3,
    “value”: “Eranga”,
    “type”: “TEXT”,
    “caseSensitive”: false
    },
    {
    “id”: 4,
    “value”: “Heshan”,
    “type”: “TEXT”,
    “caseSensitive”: false
    },
    {
    “id”: 5,
    “value”: “Thilina”,
    “type”: “TEXT”,
    “caseSensitive”: true
    }
    ],
    “tags”: [
    “MaxSoft”
    ]
    }

Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • When the user invokes the API

    Reading the access token from the text file in the directory of “C:\Users\UnimaOs\IdeaProjects\Smart-Flashcards-API-Testing-Framework\resources\access_tokens\access_token_to_be_used_for_testing.txt” is succeeded

    Invoked API Endpoint:
    http://10.199.253.84:8070/api/questions

    Response is:
    {
    “message”: “error.validation”,
    “description”: null,
    “fieldErrors”: [
    {
    “objectName”: “”,
    “field”: “correctAnswers”,
    “message”: “‘correctAnswers’ should be present”
    }
    ]
    }

Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • Then the status code for the request is "400"
Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • And the JSON Path Assertions for the response should be equal to the following
    JSON PathValue
    $.messageerror.validation
    $.descriptionnull
    $.fieldErrors[0].objectName
    $.fieldErrors[0].fieldcorrectAnswers
    $.fieldErrors[0].message'correctAnswers' should be present

    “objective1”
    ],
    “question”: {
    “imageUrl”: “https://documentservice-qa.stg-prsn.com/api/v1/documents/5a155f35d5b71d1a8a54dd58/download/public?format=ORIGINAL",

    1,2
    ],

    “type”: “TEXT”,
    “caseSensitive”: true
    },
    {
    “id”: 2,
    “value”: “Gemunu”,
    “type”: “TEXT”,

    },
