    $.descriptionnull
    $.fieldErrorsnull

Create a question using a special character as the answer5Id

00:00:00
Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • Given that a user needs to invoke "Create MCQ Type Question"

    API Endpoint is:
    http://10.199.253.84:8070/api/questions

Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • And the user set the request authentication configurations as follows
    Configuration Property NameConfiguration Property Value
    isAccessTokenIncludedTrue
    isAccessTokenRetrievedFromTextFileTrue
    accessTokenStringN/A
Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • And the user set the request attributes as follows
    Attribute Value In JSON TemplateAttribute Value To Be Set
    #creatorIdosanda12
    #creatorPlatformWeb
    #creatoredSourceApp
    #creatoredTypeManual
    #deckId51
    #kindMULTIPLE_CHOICE
    #learningObjectivesobjective1
    #imageUrlhttps://documentservice-qa.stg-prsn.com/api/v1/documents/5a155f35d5b71d1a8a54dd58/download/public?format=ORIGINAL
    #mediaTEXT
    #questionPromptWho is the owner of MaxSoft?
    #promptTypeTEXT
    #timeout120
    #rationalerationale
    #boxId1
    #correctAttempts1
    #inCorrectAttempts0
    #lastAswered2018-01-01T12:00:00+01:00
    #questionId0
    #skips0
    #userId0
    #correctAnswerList1,2
    #answer1Id1
    #answer1ValueOsanda
    #answer1TypeTEXT
    #answer1CaseSensitivetrue
    #answer2Id2
    #answer2ValueGemunu
    #answer2TypeTEXT
    #answer2CaseSensitivetrue
    #answer3Id3
    #answer3ValueEranga
    #answer3TypeTEXT
    #answer3CaseSensitivefalse
    #answer4Id4
    #answer4ValueHeshan
    #answer4TypeTEXT
    #answer4CaseSensitivefalse
    #answer5Id"@"
    #answer5ValueThilina
    #answer5TypeTEXT
    #answer5CaseSensitivetrue
    #tagsMaxSoft

    The JSON request body that you are going to use for the API is:
    {
    “creatorId”: “osanda12”,
    “creatorPlatform”: “Web”,
    “creatoredSource”: “App”,
    “creatoredType”: “Manual”,
    “deckId”: 51,
    “kind”: “MULTIPLE_CHOICE”,
    “learningObjectives”: [
    “objective1”
    ],
    “question”: {
    “imageUrl”: “https://documentservice-qa.stg-prsn.com/api/v1/documents/5a155f35d5b71d1a8a54dd58/download/public?format=ORIGINAL",
    “media”: “TEXT”,
    “prompt”: “Who is the owner of MaxSoft?”,
    “promptType”: “TEXT”,
    “timeout”: 120
    },
    “rationale”: “rationale”,
    “stats”: {
    “boxId”: 1,
    “correctAttempts”: 1,
    “inCorrectAttempts”: 0,
    “lastAswered”: “2018-01-01T12:00:00+01:00”,
    “questionId”: 0,
    “skips”: 0,
    “userId”: 0
    },
    “correctAnswers”: [
    1,2
    ],
    “answers”: [
    {
    “id”: 1,
    “value”: “Osanda”,
    “type”: “TEXT”,
    “caseSensitive”: true
    },
    {
    “id”: 2,
    “value”: “Gemunu”,
    “type”: “TEXT”,
    “caseSensitive”: true
    },
    {
    “id”: 3,
    “value”: “Eranga”,
    “type”: “TEXT”,
    “caseSensitive”: false
    },
    {
    “id”: 4,
    “value”: “Heshan”,
    “type”: “TEXT”,
    “caseSensitive”: false
    },
    {
    “id”: “@”,
    “value”: “Thilina”,
    “type”: “TEXT”,
    “caseSensitive”: true
    }
    ],
    “tags”: [
    “MaxSoft”
    ]
    }

Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • When the user invokes the API

    Reading the access token from the text file in the directory of “C:\Users\UnimaOs\IdeaProjects\Smart-Flashcards-API-Testing-Framework\resources\access_tokens\access_token_to_be_used_for_testing.txt” is succeeded

    Invoked API Endpoint:
    http://10.199.253.84:8070/api/questions

    Response is:
    {
    “message”: “answers: Invalid value ‘@’“,
    “description”: null,
    “fieldErrors”: null
    }

Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • Then the status code for the request is "400"
Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • And the JSON Path Assertions for the response should be equal to the following
    JSON PathValue
    $.messageanswers: Invalid value '@'
    $.descriptionnull
    $.fieldErrorsnull

Create a question using a negative integer value as the answer5Id

00:00:00
Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • Given that a user needs to invoke "Create MCQ Type Question"

    API Endpoint is:
    http://10.199.253.84:8070/api/questions

Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • And the user set the request authentication configurations as follows
    Configuration Property NameConfiguration Property Value
    isAccessTokenIncludedTrue
    isAccessTokenRetrievedFromTextFileTrue
    accessTokenStringN/A
Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • And the user set the request attributes as follows
    Attribute Value In JSON TemplateAttribute Value To Be Set
    #creatorIdosanda12
    #creatorPlatformWeb
    #creatoredSourceApp
    #creatoredTypeManual
    #deckId51
    #kindMULTIPLE_CHOICE
    #learningObjectivesobjective1
    #imageUrlhttps://documentservice-qa.stg-prsn.com/api/v1/documents/5a155f35d5b71d1a8a54dd58/download/public?format=ORIGINAL
    #mediaTEXT
    #questionPromptWho is the owner of MaxSoft?
    #promptTypeTEXT
    #timeout120
    #rationalerationale
    #boxId1
    #correctAttempts1
    #inCorrectAttempts0
    #lastAswered2018-01-01T12:00:00+01:00
    #questionId0
    #skips0
    #userId0
    #correctAnswerList1,2
    #answer1Id1
    #answer1ValueOsanda
    #answer1TypeTEXT
    #answer1CaseSensitivetrue
    #answer2Id2
    #answer2ValueGemunu
    #answer2TypeTEXT
    #answer2CaseSensitivetrue
    #answer3Id3
    #answer3ValueEranga
    #answer3TypeTEXT
    #answer3CaseSensitivefalse
    #answer4Id4
    #answer4ValueHeshan
    #answer4TypeTEXT
    #answer4CaseSensitivefalse
    #answer5Id-5
    #answer5ValueThilina
    #answer5TypeTEXT
    #answer5CaseSensitivetrue
    #tagsMaxSoft

    The JSON request body that you are going to use for the API is:
    {
    “creatorId”: “osanda12”,
    “creatorPlatform”: “Web”,
    “creatoredSource”: “App”,
    “creatoredType”: “Manual”,
    “deckId”: 51,
    “kind”: “MULTIPLE_CHOICE”,
    “learningObjectives”: [
    “objective1”
    ],
    “question”: {
    “imageUrl”: “https://documentservice-qa.stg-prsn.com/api/v1/documents/5a155f35d5b71d1a8a54dd58/download/public?format=ORIGINAL",
    “media”: “TEXT”,
    “prompt”: “Who is the owner of MaxSoft?”,
    “promptType”: “TEXT”,
    “timeout”: 120
    },
    “rationale”: “rationale”,
    “stats”: {
    “boxId”: 1,
    “correctAttempts”: 1,
    “inCorrectAttempts”: 0,
    “lastAswered”: “2018-01-01T12:00:00+01:00”,
    “questionId”: 0,
    “skips”: 0,
    “userId”: 0
    },
    “correctAnswers”: [
    1,2
    ],
    “answers”: [
    {
    “id”: 1,
    “value”: “Osanda”,
    “type”: “TEXT”,
    “caseSensitive”: true
    },
    {
    “id”: 2,
    “value”: “Gemunu”,
    “type”: “TEXT”,
    “caseSensitive”: true
    },
    {
    “id”: 3,
    “value”: “Eranga”,
    “type”: “TEXT”,
    “caseSensitive”: false
    },
    {
    “id”: 4,
    “value”: “Heshan”,
    “type”: “TEXT”,
    “caseSensitive”: false
    },
    {
    “id”: -5,
    “value”: “Thilina”,
    “type”: “TEXT”,
    “caseSensitive”: true
    }
    ],
    “tags”: [
    “MaxSoft”
    ]
    }

Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • When the user invokes the API

    Reading the access token from the text file in the directory of “C:\Users\UnimaOs\IdeaProjects\Smart-Flashcards-API-Testing-Framework\resources\access_tokens\access_token_to_be_used_for_testing.txt” is succeeded

    Invoked API Endpoint:
    http://10.199.253.84:8070/api/questions

    Response is:
    {
    “message”: “error.validation”,
    “description”: null,
    “fieldErrors”: [
    {
    “objectName”: “”,
    “field”: “answers[4].id”,
    “message”: “Answers id should be a positive integer.”
    }
    ]
    }

Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • Then the status code for the request is "400"
Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • And the JSON Path Assertions for the response should be equal to the following
    JSON PathValue
    $.messageerror.validation
    $.descriptionnull
    $.fieldErrors[0].objectName
    $.fieldErrors[0].fieldanswers[4].id
    $.fieldErrors[0].messageAnswers id should be a positive integer.

    }
    ]
    }

    #kindMULTIPLE_CHOICE
    #learningObjectivesobjective1
    #imageUrlhttps://documentservice-qa.stg-prsn.com/api/v1/documents/5a155f35d5b71d1a8a54dd58/download/public?format=ORIGINAL
    #mediaTEXT
    #questionPromptWho is the owner of MaxSoft?
    #promptTypeTEXT
    #timeout120
    #rationalerationale
    #boxId1
    #correctAttempts1
    #inCorrectAttempts0
    #lastAswered2018-01-01T12:00:00+01:00
    #questionId0
    #skips0
    #userId0
    #correctAnswerList1,2
    #answer1Id1
    #answer1Valueanswer1
    #answer1TypeTEXT
    #answer1CaseSensitivetrue
    #answer2Id2
    #answer2Valueanswer2
    #answer2TypeTEXT
    #answer2CaseSensitivetrue
    #answer3Id3
    #answer3Valueanswer3
    #answer3TypeTEXT
    #answer3CaseSensitivefalse
    #answer4Id4
    #answer4ValueHeshan
    #answer4TypeTEXT
    #answer4CaseSensitivefalse
    #answer5Id5
    #answer5Value"null"
    #answer5TypeTEXT
    #answer5CaseSensitivetrue
    #tagsMaxSoft

    The JSON request body that you are going to use for the API is:
    {
    “creatorId”: “osanda12”,
    “creatorPlatform”: “Web”,
    “creatoredSource”: “App”,
    “creatoredType”: “Manual”,
    “deckId”: 51,
    “kind”: “MULTIPLE_CHOICE”,
    “learningObjectives”: [
    “objective1”
    ],
    “question”: {
    “imageUrl”: “https://documentservice-qa.stg-prsn.com/api/v1/documents/5a155f35d5b71d1a8a54dd58/download/public?format=ORIGINAL",
    “media”: “TEXT”,
    “prompt”: “Who is the owner of MaxSoft?”,
    “promptType”: “TEXT”,
    “timeout”: 120
    },
    “rationale”: “rationale”,
    “stats”: {
    “boxId”: 1,
    “correctAttempts”: 1,
    “inCorrectAttempts”: 0,
    “lastAswered”: “2018-01-01T12:00:00+01:00”,
    “questionId”: 0,
    “skips”: 0,
    “userId”: 0
    },
    “correctAnswers”: [
    1,2
    ],
    “answers”: [
    {
    “id”: 1,
    “value”: “answer1”,
    “type”: “TEXT”,
    “caseSensitive”: true
    },
    {
    “id”: 2,
    “value”: “answer2”,
    “type”: “TEXT”,
    “caseSensitive”: true
    },
    {
    “id”: 3,
    “value”: “answer3”,
    “type”: “TEXT”,
    “caseSensitive”: false
    },
    {
    “id”: 4,
    “value”: “Heshan”,
    “type”: “TEXT”,
    “caseSensitive”: false
    },
    {
    “id”: 5,
    “value”: null,
    “type”: “TEXT”,
    “caseSensitive”: true
    }
    ],
    “tags”: [
    “MaxSoft”
    ]
    }

Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • When the user invokes the API

    Reading the access token from the text file in the directory of “C:\Users\UnimaOs\IdeaProjects\Smart-Flashcards-API-Testing-Framework\resources\access_tokens\access_token_to_be_used_for_testing.txt” is succeeded

    Invoked API Endpoint:
    http://10.199.253.84:8070/api/questions

    Response is:
    {
    “message”: “error.validation”,
    “description”: null,
    “fieldErrors”: [
    {
    “objectName”: “”,
    “field”: “answers[4].value”,
    “message”: “‘value’ Cannot be null or empty”
    }
    ]
    }

Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • Then the status code for the request is "400"
Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • And the JSON Path Assertions for the response should be equal to the following
    JSON PathValue
    $.messageerror.validation
    $.descriptionnull
    $.fieldErrors[0].objectName
    $.fieldErrors[0].fieldanswers[4].value
    $.fieldErrors[0].message'value' Cannot be null or empty

Create a question using empty value as the answer5Type

00:00:00
Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • Given that a user needs to invoke "Create MCQ Type Question"

    API Endpoint is:
    http://10.199.253.84:8070/api/questions

Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • And the user set the request authentication configurations as follows
    Configuration Property NameConfiguration Property Value
    isAccessTokenIncludedTrue
    isAccessTokenRetrievedFromTextFileTrue
    accessTokenStringN/A
Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • And the user set the request attributes as follows
    Attribute Value In JSON TemplateAttribute Value To Be Set
    #creatorIdosanda12
    #creatorPlatformWeb
    #creatoredSourceApp
    #creatoredTypeManual
    #deckId51
    #kindMULTIPLE_CHOICE
    #learningObjectivesobjective1
    #imageUrlhttps://documentservice-qa.stg-prsn.com/api/v1/documents/5a155f35d5b71d1a8a54dd58/download/public?format=ORIGINAL
    #mediaTEXT
    #questionPromptWho is the owner of MaxSoft?
    #promptTypeTEXT
    #timeout120
    #rationalerationale
    #boxId1
    #correctAttempts1
    #inCorrectAttempts0
    #lastAswered2018-01-01T12:00:00+01:00
    #questionId0
    #skips0
    #userId0
    #correctAnswerList1,2
    #answer1Id1
    #answer1ValueOsanda
    #answer1TypeTEXT
    #answer1CaseSensitivetrue
    #answer2Id2
    #answer2ValueGemunu
    #answer2TypeTEXT
    #answer2CaseSensitivetrue
    #answer3Id3
    #answer3ValueEranga
    #answer3TypeTEXT
    #answer3CaseSensitivefalse
    #answer4Id4
    #answer4ValueHeshan
    #answer4TypeTEXT
    #answer4CaseSensitivefalse
    #answer5Id5
    #answer5ValueThilina
    #answer5Type
    #answer5CaseSensitivetrue
    #tagsMaxSoft

    The JSON request body that you are going to use for the API is:
    {
    “creatorId”: “osanda12”,
    “creatorPlatform”: “Web”,
    “creatoredSource”: “App”,
    “creatoredType”: “Manual”,
    “deckId”: 51,
    “kind”: “MULTIPLE_CHOICE”,
    “learningObjectives”: [
    “objective1”
    ],
    “question”: {
    “imageUrl”: “https://documentservice-qa.stg-prsn.com/api/v1/documents/5a155f35d5b71d1a8a54dd58/download/public?format=ORIGINAL",
    “media”: “TEXT”,
    “prompt”: “Who is the owner of MaxSoft?”,
    “promptType”: “TEXT”,
    “timeout”: 120
    },
    “rationale”: “rationale”,
    “stats”: {
    “boxId”: 1,
    “correctAttempts”: 1,
    “inCorrectAttempts”: 0,
    “lastAswered”: “2018-01-01T12:00:00+01:00”,
    “questionId”: 0,
    “skips”: 0,
    “userId”: 0
    },
    “correctAnswers”: [
    1,2
    ],
    “answers”: [
    {
    “id”: 1,
    “value”: “Osanda”,
    “type”: “TEXT”,
    “caseSensitive”: true
    },
    {
    “id”: 2,
    “value”: “Gemunu”,
    “type”: “TEXT”,
    “caseSensitive”: true
    },
    {
    “id”: 3,
    “value”: “Eranga”,
    “type”: “TEXT”,
    “caseSensitive”: false
    },
    {
    “id”: 4,
    “value”: “Heshan”,

    “caseSensitive”: false
    },
    {
    “id”: 5,
    “value”: “Thilina”,
    “type”: “”,
    “caseSensitive”: true
    }
    ],
    “tags”: [

    ]
    }

  • When the user invokes the API

    Reading the access token from the text file in the directory of “C:\Users\UnimaOs\IdeaProjects\Smart-Flashcards-API-Testing-Framework\resources\access_tokens\access_token_to_be_used_for_testing.txt” is succeeded

    Invoked API Endpoint:

    Response is:
    {
    “message”: “error.validation”,
    “description”: null,
    “fieldErrors”: [
    {
    “objectName”: “”,
    “field”: “answers[4].type”,
    “message”: “must match \“TEXT|HTML|IMAGE|VIDEO|AUDIO\“”
    }
    ]
    }

Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • Then the status code for the request is "400"
Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • And the JSON Path Assertions for the response should be equal to the following
    JSON PathValue
    $.messageerror.validation
    $.descriptionnull
    $.fieldErrors[0].objectName
    $.fieldErrors[0].fieldanswers[4].type
    $.fieldErrors[0].messagemust match "TEXT|HTML|IMAGE|VIDEO|AUDIO

Create a question using an invalid creatorPlatform

00:00:01
Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • Given that a user needs to invoke "Create MCQ Type Question"

    API Endpoint is:
    http://10.199.253.84:8070/api/questions

Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • And the user set the request authentication configurations as follows
    Configuration Property NameConfiguration Property Value
    isAccessTokenIncludedTrue
    isAccessTokenRetrievedFromTextFileTrue
    accessTokenStringN/A
Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • And the user set the request attributes as follows
    Attribute Value In JSON TemplateAttribute Value To Be Set
    #creatorIdosanda12
    #creatorPlatformWe
    #creatoredSourceApp
    #creatoredTypeManual
    #deckId51
    #kindMULTIPLE_CHOICE
    #learningObjectiveslearningObjective1
    #imageUrlhttps://documentservice-qa.stg-prsn.com/api/v1/documents/5a155f35d5b71d1a8a54dd58/download/public?format=ORIGINAL
    #mediaTEXT
    #questionPromptWho is the owner of MaxSoft? _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _
    #promptTypeTEXT
    #timeout60
    #rationalerationale
    #boxId0
    #correctAttempts1
    #inCorrectAttempts0
    #lastAswered2018-01-01T12:00:00+01:00
    #questionId0
    #skips0
    #userId0
    #correctAnswerList1,2
    #answer1Id1
    #answer1ValueOsanda
    #answer1TypeTEXT
    #answer1CaseSensitivetrue
    #answer2Id2

    #answer2TypeTEXT
    #answer2CaseSensitivetrue
    #answer3Id3
    #answer3ValueEranga
    #answer3TypeTEXT
    #answer3CaseSensitivefalse
    #answer4Id4
    #answer4ValueHeshan
    #answer4TypeTEXT
    #answer4CaseSensitivefalse
    #answer5Id5
    #answer5ValueThilina
    #answer5TypeTEXT
    #answer5CaseSensitivetrue
    #tagsMaxSoft

    The JSON request body that you are going to use for the API is:
    {
    “creatorId”: “osanda12”,
    “creatorPlatform”: “We”,
    “creatoredSource”: “App”,
    “creatoredType”: “Manual”,
    “deckId”: 51,
    “kind”: “MULTIPLE_CHOICE”,
    “learningObjectives”: [
    “learningObjective1”
    ],
    “question”: {
    “imageUrl”: “https://documentservice-qa.stg-prsn.com/api/v1/documents/5a155f35d5b71d1a8a54dd58/download/public?format=ORIGINAL",
    “media”: “TEXT”,
    “prompt”: “Who is the owner of MaxSoft? _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _“,
    “promptType”: “TEXT”,
    “timeout”: 60
    },
    “rationale”: “rationale”,
    “stats”: {
    “boxId”: 0,
    “correctAttempts”: 1,
    “inCorrectAttempts”: 0,
    “lastAswered”: “2018-01-01T12:00:00+01:00”,

    “skips”: 0,
    “userId”: 0
    },
    “correctAnswers”: [
    1,2
    ],
    “answers”: [
    {
    “id”: 1,
    “value”: “Osanda”,
    “type”: “TEXT”,
    “caseSensitive”: true
    },
    {
    “id”: 2,
    “value”: “Gemunu”,
    “type”: “TEXT”,

    },
    {
    “id”: 3,
    “value”: “Eranga”,

    “caseSensitive”: false
    },
    {
    “id”: 4,

    },
    {
    “id”: 5,

    }
    ],
    “tags”: [

    ]
    }

  • When the user invokes the API

    Reading the access token from the text file in the directory of “C:\Users\UnimaOs\IdeaProjects\Smart-Flashcards-API-Testing-Framework\resources\access_tokens\access_token_to_be_used_for_testing.txt” is succeeded

    Invoked API Endpoint:
    http://10.199.253.84:8070/api/questions

    Response is:
    {
    “message”: “error.validation”,
    “description”: null,
    “fieldErrors”: [
    {
    “objectName”: “”,
    “field”: “creatorPlatform”,
    “message”: “must match \“Mobile|Web|AuthoringTool\“”
    }
    ]
    }

Create a question using an invalid imageUrl

00:00:00
Execution Time : 00:00:00
  • Given that a user needs to invoke "Create MCQ Type Question"

    API Endpoint is:
    http://10.199.253.84:8070/api/questions

    Attribute Value In JSON TemplateAttribute Value To Be Set

    #creatorPlatformWeb

    #creatoredTypeManual
    #deckId51
    #kindMULTIPLE_CHOICE
    #learningObjectivesobjective1
    #imageUrlwww.maxsoft/image
    #mediaTEXT
    #questionPromptWho is the owner of MaxSoft? _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _
    #promptTypeTEXT
    #timeout60
    #rationalerationale
    #boxId0
    #correctAttempts1
    #inCorrectAttempts0
    #lastAswered2018-01-01T12:00:00+01:00

    #answer4TypeTEXT
    #answer4CaseSensitivefalse
    #answer5Id5
    #answer5ValueThilina
    #answer5TypeTEXT
    #answer5CaseSensitivetrue
    #tagsMaxSoft

    The JSON request body that you are going to use for the API is:
    {
    “creatorId”: “osanda12”,
    “creatorPlatform”: “Web”,
    “creatoredSource”: “App”,
    “creatoredType”: “Manual”,
    “deckId”: 51,
    “kind”: “MULTIPLE_CHOICE”,
    “learningObjectives”: [
    “objective1”
